112.title: Game of Thrones

choices: Danaerys takes all 8,000 Unsullied plus those in training.
Danaerys wishes to sample the Wine of Beauty
Later, Jorah heads to the slave market
11232.content:
Kraznys mo Nakloz lead them across the walls of Astapor, talking at length in High Valyrian of the Unsullied slave soldiers while the slave girl at his side translated. Jorah Mormont followed behind them, trying to keep his eyes away from the Queen backside and on the slaver. He had decided he didn't like the Good Master, something about his attitude displeased him, though the meaning of his words were lost to him. Not that he'd had much love for the slave city and its rulers to begin with.

"The Unsullied have stood here for a day and night without food or water. They will stand until they drop. Such is their obedience," the slave girl spoke, as they enter a courtyard.

Row after row of slaves faced them, standing rigidly to attention in the baking sun, their round shields and spiked caps glinting. Sweat trickled down the bronze skin of their bodies, but behind their helms their eyes stared forward impassively, as if they didn't feel the heat.

These couldn't be the Unsullied, Jorah thought, confused. They were women. While garbed as soldiers, the bodies beneath were broad-hipped and curvaceous. Though their physiques were muscular and and honed, the heavy breasts that strained against the dark leather armour were clearly ill suited for combat. Many wore their hair long, which fell in long braids from beneath their caps.

"There's been a mistake. We asked for soldiers, not slave women," Jorah said.

"[Tell the old man he smells of piss,]" Kraznys spat.

The translator hesitated before speaking. "My master bids tell you that the Unsullied are not women. All these you see here where born as men."

As one, the ranks of soldiers parted to allow the small group to pass between them. Jorah felt his heart quicken as he walked the narrow corridor, the rows of perfect female specimens stood so close that their huge, leather-clad breasts were pressed against him. Long-lashed, beautiful brown eyes stared out from behind the slits in their helms. "I know eunuchs when I see them," Jorah retorted. "These aren't eunuchs."

Kraznys uttered something at length, and the slave girl spoke. "Each Unsullied was once a slave boy. They begin their training at 5. They are cut and their bodies molded to suit our needs. Every day they drill from dawn to dusk until they have mastered the short sword, shield, and spear. Every night they are drilled until they have mastered the arts of pleasure. The Unsullied are both infantry and whores, unparalleled in both."

Jorah couldn't help but smile as he looked to Daenerys. Her face was a picture. She seemed almost intimidated by the soldiers, who not only matched her in the flawlessness of their beauty, but also made her chest look like that of a boy in comparison. Folding her arms self-consciously about her inadequate breasts, she asked, "How is this done?"

"The Unsullied drink of two elixirs every day. The Wine of Courage deadens their sensitivity to pain, makes them obedient, strong and fearless in battle. The Wine of Beauty gives them a woman's form, makes their skin soft, their breasts full. It is this that makes them so deadly on the field. Their wanton bodies seduce men to distraction even as they kill them. They are the perfect soldiers. Look good women, they are obedient. They will not, indeed can not, rape or become bloodcrazed. After you conquer a city, they will allow themselves to be fucked for gold, and will give all of it to you. Many owners use them to service and satisfy their other soldiers, even entire armies."

"This Wine of Beauty sounds like powerful stuff, if it can turn men into these," Jorah remarked in wonder. "I can't help but wonder what effect it would have on women," he chuckled.

Daenerys rolled her eyes. "It is this Wine of Courage that concerns me more. You say they fear nothing?"

"[Tell this ignorant whore of a westerner to open her eyes and watch,]" Kraznys said, stepping towards the nearest Unsullied. Drawing it's knife, he cut away the leather straps covering its breasts. The nipples were large, and the Unsullied remained impassive as the slave owner sliced them away, against the objections of the Queen. "[She's worried about their nipples? Does the dumb bitch not know we already cut off their balls,]" he chuckled. "[Tell the Westerosi whore to decide by tomorrow.]"
11232.title: Jorah Mormont

choices: She tries some, and bids Jorah to try it too
112322.content:
As the viewing was about to conclude, a bell began to toll out over the city. "What's that?" Jorah asked.

"That is the call to drink. The Unsullied must drink the Wines of Courage and Beauty ever day. Without the Wine of Courage, they will grow soft and weak. Without the Wine of Beauty-"

"-they become men again?"

Kraznys mo Nakloz scoffed when the slave girl translated Jorah's words. "[The Unsullied will become men again when Old Valyria rises from the sea. No, without the Wine of Beauty, they become like the men they once were, but only in mind. They regain a man's appetites, and will begin to lust after women, even each other. Whole armies of Unsullied fucking each other with phantom cocks,]" the slaver said with distaste.

Two barrels were rolled into the courtyard. The Unsullied looked to their master expectantly and at a wave of his hand, they stepped out of their formation one-by-one, moving to the two barrels and pouring themselves a small quantity of the liquid from each barrel. They drank it down as though it was a great gift. Danaerys' interest was piqued. She stepped closer, sniffing the thick, deep purple wine. "Is it safe to drink?"

A thin smile twisted the slaver's lips, and he barked something guteral.

"Of course. My master bids you to sample some for yourself."
112322.title: Danaerys wishes to sample the Wine of Beauty

choices: The magic of the wine is stronger than they expected, turning him into a woman
The effects of the wine are mild, turning him slim and effeminate
The effects of the wine are negligible on him, but Daenerys becomes a bimbo
1123222.content:
As she held the cup of wine, her gaze lingered on the chests of the Unsullied. Kal Drogo had made her feel like a woman for the first time in her life, but since his death that feeling had faded fast. Now even these men stood before her were more beautiful, more feminine than her. The words of Mirii Maz Duur still haunted her. 'When your womb quickens again, and you bear a living child. Then he will return, and not before.' She had yet to face the possibility that she was barren, but if this wine could make women out of boy slaves perhaps it could make her fertile again.

She brought the cup to her lips, but just as she was about to drink she saw Jorah Mormont watching her expectantly, hungrily. She giggled to herself. The old bear expects my breasts to explode free at the first taste of the elixir, she thought in amusement. A devilish thought occurred to her. "Won't you try some too, Ser Jorah?" she asked coyly. His eyes widened in horror. "I hardly think you'll become a woman from just a drink," she laughed. "Right?"

The translator nodded. "The wine only transforms eunuchs, and only over many months of drinking it each day. There are myths of it changing uncut men into women but, even if such tales are true, such potent magic hasn't existed for a thousand years."

The Queen pushed the cup into her knight's hands. "See? You have nothing to worry about. Besides, I'd like to see you with soft skin," she laughed lightly, running her fingers over the coarse stubble of his jaw.

"As my Queen commands," he gulped, the slightest touch enough to break his resolve.

11232223.content: Does Dany become just physically a bimbo? Or the mind and body?
11232223.title: Physical, Mental, or both?

112331.content:
The wedding was over. In the halls above, the feast was being cleared away, the butchered bodies of Robb Stark's bannermen dragged to be burnt or thrown from the ramparts into the river. Endless buckets of water and an army of servants were at work scrubbing the blood from the floor. Walder Frey watched it all gleefully, still in the seat where he had sat throughout the massacre.

In the dripping wet dungeons beneath the Twins, Roose Bolton had begun work on an abomination. Assuming the Lannisters held to their part of the bargain, he was to be made Warden of the North, and he intended to send a message to the other Houses of the North that they would remember for a long time, one which would strike fear into their hearts at the mere mention of the liege Lord. He would make a mockery of the young wolf's body, decapitating him and sewing the head of his Direwolf in place. There were only two problems...

The first was a minor trifle, and would resolve itself in time, he had no doubt. The boy, more stubborn even than his father, refused to die, even despite the two arrow wounds that pierced his shoulder from front to back, and the knife in his belly. It was unnatural, but the boy could only have so much blood in him. Laid out on a slab of cold stone, Robb Stark was looking paler even than the leech lord, his chest rising and falling in shallow breaths. Until the young wolf's death, Roose Bolton had decided to rekindle a few of his House's old traditions. His fingers glided over a selection of razor sharp knives, selecting with an expert eye the implement that would draw out the torment, as he flayed the boy alive.

The second, more troubling, problem was that the boy's Direwolf, Grey Wind, had escaped his kennel during the events of the Red Wedding, and was nowhere to be found. If his men could not track it down, perhaps he would have to settle for a regular wolf.

The hours wore on, the leech Lord savoring his work. The old ways were truly still the best, and his House had refined them to an art. They could skin a man totally, and still keep him alive long enough for him to see their handiwork. Yet as a miserable dawn began to creep over the Twins, and Robb Stark still refused to succumb to death, Roose began to consider the need for restraints. The ex-King in the North's eyelids fluttered.

"My lord."

Roose looked up as one of his men stepped into the dungeon. He looked wet and tired from a long night of hunting in the storm. "Have you found the Direwolf?" Roose asked quietly, and the soldier looked uncomfortable.

"Not quite, my lord. We found... a Direwolf. A she-wolf, bigger than any we've ever seen, leading a pack of wolves. It killed four of our men before we could get a spear through it."

A rare smile almost formed on Roose Bolton's lips, but thought better of it. He had heard the tales of the female Direwolf harassing the Riverlands. His hands assessed the half-flayed body of the King laid out before him. Perhaps a new skin would suit Robb Stark better. "How large would you say this wolf is?" he asked. "As large as a man?"
112331.title: Roose Bolton

1123311.content:
The Direwolf was pregnant, or at least had been recently, Bolton realised, as it was dragged into the dungeon beside Robb and he set to the task of removing its pelt. It's eight teats were heavily swollen. It amused Bolton no end to think that the Young Wolf would soon be wearing those teats, though he doubted if the boy would survive long enough to enjoy them.

The wolf had been killed a single, clean spear strike to the back of the head. She was indeed huge, as large as a man and then some, and it took longer than he expected to strip the thick grey fur away from the flesh beneath. He blunted several knives carving through the dense muscles and his pale face was soon sweaty and red, but eventually he pulled the pelt away, whole and almost undamaged.

"The Young Wolf. Soon to be the Young Bitch," he chuckled mirthlessly to himself as he returned his attentions to Robb Stark. The boy moaned weakly. How the pain alone hadn't killed him yet, Bolton couldn't fathom. His eyes rolled in his head, vacant and pale grey. "Whatever gods, old or new, that are keeping you from death, I hope they keep doing it long enough for you to see what I've done. If the gods are good, I may even have time to parade you in front of you before your vassals, so that they'll know what happens to those who cross me."

He selected a curved blade. Better to castrate the last son of Winterfell now, and put an end to the Stark line? An additional insult to be sure, but unnecessary, and he couldn't be sure if Robb could afford to lose more blood.
1123311.title: Give him the Direwolf skin

choices: Organize a grand hunt, with Robb as the quarry
11233111.content:
Taking the gelding knife, he castrated the boy, root and stem, and cast his parts aside with the large chunks of skin already peeled away. The she-wolf's mangy cunt would serve the King in the North from now on. Stemming the flow of blood from between the boy's legs as best as he cared to, he eagerly set to work robbing the boy-King of the rest of his skin. It would be his greatest work, and he eagerly awaited adding it to the rest, the collection of leatherly skins that hung in the Dreadfort, rumoured to have belonged to ancient Stark kings.

Soon Robb was little more than exposed red meat. The direwolf pelt slid easily over his wet flesh, his arms and legs fitting snugly inside the wolf's limbs, though the chest of the fur hung loose about Robb's chest, requiring him to cut much of it away to make it fit. Pushing aside the dark red locks of hair that now littered the stone slab, he pushed Robb's head inside the wolf's head and then, pulling the two halves of the fur together above the white bones of the boy's spine, he stitched the seam together with surgical thread, sealing him inside. Rolling the boy back over, he allowed himself a chuckle at the sight of the two rows of teats running up the front of his body.

Bolton's arms were thick with blood, from fingers to shoulders. Yet still the boy breathed. It was unnatural. Suddenly feeling exhausted, and aware that it was past midday, he decided to retire to bed. Robb would be dead by the time he awoke, no doubt... though just in case, he made sure to shackle him first.

-|-|-|-|-|-|-


"Alive? What do you mean he's still alive?! That's impossible!" Lord Walder Frey screeched, drops of thin gruel spraying from his lip.

Roose Bolton simply shrugged slowly. "These are strange times."

"Strange doesn't cover it! We ran him through. You ran him through" Frey exclaimed, pointing a shaking, accusatory finger. "Don't tell me you didn't have the guts to see it through."

"I can't explain it. By all rights, the boy should be dead," Bolton admitted. "He's lost more blood than should be possible, yet when I checked on him, he still breathed and his wounds had begun to heal. Either I am a better healer than I know, or it is magic."

At the last word, Walder Frey paled and sank back into his chair, trembling. "Wine," he stammered weakly. "Somebody get me wine."

"There is a rumour that Lord Beric still roams the Riverlands, though he is known to have been killed several times, all on the prayers of a fire priest," Roose Bolton offered calmly. "Perhaps somebody out there is praying for the Stark boy."

"W-well what are we to do about it," Frey mumbled fearfully. "You'll have to finish the job. Cut his head off and throw it in the river. Let the gods heal that!"

"There's really no need. I've gelded him myself, the Stark line is no more. Besides, no northman will ever follow him again after they see what I've done to him."

-|-|-|-|-|-|-


Walder Frey hung back behind his men as he followed Bolton down into the dripping dungeons. Robb Stark still lay exactly where he had been left, his wrists and ankles shackled in iron chains bolted to the slab. Roose stepped forward, pressing his fingers to the castrated King's belly and massaging the fur. Somehow, either through magic or just the congealing of the blood, the direwolf pelt had fastened itself tightly to the flesh beneath, as though Robb had been born in it. Casually he ran a hand down the short, dark fur of the stomach, over the rows of pink teats, then down , sliding his fingers between the soft fur of the King's thighs and into his warm, tight, animal hole. He leaned closer to Robb's face encased in the direwolf's muzzle, feeling the shallow, still living breath of the beast on his cheek. The King in the North smelled like an animal, stinking of blood and sweat and the filth matted in her hide.

Frey crept forward, cautious at first until he saw the chains and the results of Bolton's work. His watery eyes shone with victory, as they had during the wedding.
11233111.title: Do it...

choices: They have more dogs for Robb's amusement
112331112.content:
For days Robb slept, tossing and turning feverishly on the slab as his wounds healed and the fur sealed itself to his flesh until they had become one, a she-wolf with a human's form. There was some magic at play to be sure, perhaps some ancient secret in the Stark's blood from their days as wargs, but as long as it continued to work for Roose he didn't care to question it. On the fifth day, they sealed an iron collar about his neck, dragged him out into the kennels, and tied him to a stake with a thick chain. His hands and feet were shackled and chained, and the chains passed through metal loops in the floor. The chains could be pulled on, spreading the King's legs so that the hounds could sniff at his haunch. On a cold morning, they pulled a bucket of water from the river and threw it over him, and he came awake spluttering.

Coming awake was painful. He had been having a wonderful dream. He'd dreamt he was Grey Wolf, running free across the Riverlands, away from the humans and The Twins, away from all the horror of the wedding, which faded in his mind to little more than the memory of a nightmare. Then he awoke to find the nightmare was real, his family, his wife, his men all dead, his war utterly lost, his body butchered and warped to Roose Bolton's sadistic design. Even his humanity had been taken. The freezing water dripped from his matted fur.

Three hunting hounds paced around the walls of the kennel. Robb smelled of Direwolf, and now that he was awake they had backed away, sniffing at him timidly. Yet as the helplessness of the chained creature dawned on the animals, they became bolder. The smallest but boldest of the animals slunk behind Robb. He tried to pull away, a high whimper coming from his throat as he felt the dog's wet nose sniffing against the hole where his manhood had once been. The chains held him there.

The Frey soldiers watched him through the bars of the kennel, and they howled with laughter as the first dog mounted him, invading him with its hot shaft. His chains rattled as he tried without success to throw the heavy, hairy weight from his back. Robb bit his tongue, not giving his audience the satisfaction of crying out.

Only when one of the larger hounds snapped at the first dog did it disengage itself, though only for the second dog to climb onto his back and claim him.

"King in the North! King in the North!" the men shouted jubilantly.

The dog inside him panted happily as it thrust away, its tongue lolling from its mouth, its breath hot on the back of his neck. To his further horror, he felt the shaft swelling painfully inside him, locking them together. Robb hung his head, feeling the dog spasm as its seed filled him. Only after what felt like an eternity did the animal disengage.

The third dog was small, scrawny and mangy, with loose, hanging fur. It had to stand on tiptoe to enter him, and the bones of its rib cage scraped over his spine as it humped him. The filthy beast seemed to savour the experience, drawing it out for an hour, hopping off the King's back every now and then to eat from a bowl of slop or relieve itself in the corner. The sound of the kennel door being unbarred and opened finally sends it scurrying into the corner.
112331112.title: Give Robb to his dogs

1123311122.content:
"I think the wolf bitch has had her fill of these three," the Bolton soldier leered down at Robb. His face was scared and cruel, missing teeth and half a nose. He seized the three dogs by their collars, dragging them from the kennel.

"Don't worry, bitch, you'll have plenty of others to keep you company," he said, returning and stooping down to check Robb's restraints. "When you had the North march south on your pointless war, your men brought lots of dogs with them. Dogs for war, dogs for hunting, dogs for sniffing out scouts. Hundreds of them. Well we killed your men, King in the North, but not their dogs. We're not monsters."

A dozen dogs were being lead into the kennel, Mormont's dogs from Bear Island, huge and shaggy and black, with loose, slobbering jowls and massive hairy cocks dangling between their legs. They strained at their collars their handlers were red-faced trying to control them.

"Didn't bring many bitches though. That wasn't very fair, bringing so far from their homes with no bitches to keep them company. Between that and all the fighting, it's sent them all a little crazy. They're straining at their chains just from the smell of you. Half of them would gnaw their front legs of to get inside a fine piece of tail like you. So... we're going to let them have their fun. All of them."

One of the handlers releaased his chain, and the first, huge beast of Bear Island mounted his ex-master's King, driving his massive cock between his legs. A moan escaped Robb's lips as the weight of the animal forced the hair from his lungs. The men sniggered.

"After you've finished fucking the entire camp, you're to be taken back North to the Bolton's new castle, Winterfell. Roose is having a lovely breeding pen made out for you. As soon as we catch your bloody Direwolf, we're going to get you to work popping out a litter or two. For Roose to wear, you understand."
1123311122.title: They have more dogs for Robb's amusement

Bart was walking round the neighbourhood with his eternal friend and side-kick Milhouse. He spotted a garage sale out on the lawn of one of the houses.

A quick glance at the objects being sold quickly told Bart that there was an opportunity here. There was the usual selection of things being thrown out from the garage. But what peaked his attention was when he realised who actually lived here.

Professor Frink.

Curiosity got the better of him, as he was drawn to the table with the items on that he couldn't recognise. Their blinking lights and pinging sounds drew Milhouse over too.

"Woah, Bart. What do you think this is?" he said picking up an item at random.

1143211.content:
Jasmine was wandering round the palace, alone in her thoughts. Aladdin was off fighting Mechanicles, so hopefully it won't be for too long. She felt a deep loneliness creeping into her soul as she had in her childhood.

However a smile twitched at the corner of her mouth as she recalled her imaginary childhood friend. Genie flew in the window followed by the Carpet with Aladdin and Abu. From the smiles on their faces, it was clear that their adventure had ended successfully.

With a quiet call to a servant she arranged for some tea and biscuits to come. She knew how her afternoon would be spent as the boys regaled her with stories of what had happened.

The story was fun, and she loved the way that Aladdin acted out the events of their adventure. She sighed a little as she had missed out on such a significant part of Aladdin's life. But after the story he retired exhausted for the night leaving Jasmine and Genie.

11432111.content:
Genie felt her pain and loneliness, as she spoke. He felt that she needed a break from the isolation. Genie snapped his fingers and the magic flew away down the corridors, until if found the sleeping figure of Aladdin.

"So Princess, How did you ever imagine your friend?" he asked.

It was as if a dam broke. He was almost overwhelmed, at the detail of her description. From the smallest detail of her face, how curved her nose was, or how her laugh was like tinkling glass.

She smiled as she recalled her personality. Genie was a little surprised that she was a princess, too. But it would be more familiar to Jasmine than anyone or anything else.

He knew that the magic would be having a field day with such specific details.

As the night wore on, it became obvious to him how emotional Jasmine was for this release. As she hugged, the blue guy she let a sole tear roll down her cheek.

114321111.content:
Waking with a yawn, Aladdin sat up in bed. It was always nice to wake up in the palace. Too many years living on the streets made him appreciate the soft mattress and the comfy bedding.

Running his hand through his hair he discovered it was much longer and softer than he recalled. But that was overshadowed by his discovery of his new sex. The bust was a revelation, the merest touch caused a surprised gasp to escape her lips.

Dashing over to the mirror she looked at her reflection. Her beauty was impossible to deny, her lips were full and her mouth formed a natural pout. It gave her look of need, and Aladdin knew what he'd do when presented with a willing mouth like that. The face already had an complete and perfect layer of make-up on it. Aladdin ran the back of her hand across it, hoping to smear the perfection away. To make her less alluring, less perfect, less of a woman...

It resisted her efforts, it was clearly a work of magic, although whether a prank by genie, or if genie had decided he needed to learn a lesson it was unclear. But at least she was pretty.

Aladdin blew kisses to her reflection, but that caused confusing feelings and she stopped and looked away.

Taking in her naked body, she knew she'd feel more comfortable being clothed. Her former attire had vanished, and resting on a padded stool beside the bed was a set of clothes suitable for her new body, and the support it would need.

Cupping the girls in his hands, he enjoyed their warmth, and estimated them as being slightly larger... slightly fuller than Jasmine's own. Her thumbs brushed over the tender flesh, and a warm tingle raced down her spine when they passed over her nipples. The tingle ended in her crotch, and she dropped them in shock and fear.

The temptation to keep caressing and teasing them was immense, but she focused on getting dressed. Once she had put on her clothes she returned to the mirror. Standing further back allowed her to take in the full effect. She looked every inch the princess, not a twin for Jasmine, but very like a sister or a best friend.

Turning this way and that she admired how she filled her clothes, and the way the revealed and concealed her curves.

She stopped her posing when a disturbing thought struck her. Perhaps this is dark magic, and not from Genie... A curse to keep him from his beloved's side... or cast by someone without her best interests at heart.

The list of villians that he'd fought was now scarier, her current body didn't inspire as much confidence as his old one. Mozenrath and Sadira were both quite familiar with magic, Mirage was certainly capable of changing his entire world.

She bolted for the door. If this was the change inflicted on her what might Jasmine look like now. Aladdin's mind raced ahead, filling her with dread, and chilling alternatives.

As she darted through the palace, she found her whole body moved differently. It required more concentration, as she jiggled and shimmied. Her body kept on moving, when she changed directions... It was very unsettling, and humiliating, she raced past the guards.

That made her self-conscious, but at least they didn't shout at her as if she were an intruder. But she felt their eyes boring into her, following her, with a less than professional air.

Her body dictated a certain pace, although it felt like the girls wanted to burst free from the top, they found a steady rhythm, and she found her ass forming a counter-balancing jiggle.

She left the guest quarters behind and entered the palace's royal suite. Jasmine's door was closed. The large double doors intimidating, as they stretched towards the ceiling.

Aladdin took a second to gather her thoughts, catch her breath and check she was still decently dressed. With a slightly manic giggle, she kept her hysteria at bay. At least the Sultan couldn't object to her entry on grounds of propriety...

It was fantastic for Aladdin to see a friendly face, even is she didn't recognise him. - - -

By the time the girls had walked through the palace, they found Razoul and three of his hand-picked guards mounted and waiting in the courtyard.

The girls mounted up, Aladda feeling very vulnerable as she swung her female body... her weaker body into the saddle. It was much higher than she was used to, and the horses back felt wider than she preferred as her legs slid down either side.

Aladdin had worked out that she was a royal princess, and Jasmine's sister, also the magic didn't appear malicious, so she went along with it. But there was a question that she wanted answered, but couldn't just ask.

Was Jasmine her big sister, or little sister? Clearly there wasn't much between them.

Jasmine was in her traditional pale blue outfit, while Aladda wore a simple yellow number. The ride through the city was unsettling too. The admiring looks from the women, the ogling stares from the men, the awestruck little girls, and the preening boys. It all conspired to keep her aware of her new gender and beauty.

11432111133.content:
When the princesses and their guard left the city of Agrabah, Aladda kept attempting to get close to Jasmine to speak with her and try to learn a little bit more about his situation but every time he tried she took it was a challenge and raced further ahead making Aladda ride faster to catch up. And riding face was not a comfortable feeling now with his large hair and even larger breasts. After a long time riding, Aladda thought he saw the oasis in the distance, but as soon as they got within about a hundred feet of the oasis, a sandstorm appeared out of nowhere as if by magic. Aladda could only see a few feet in front of her, but luckily he was right behind Jasmine so he was able to keep her within arms reach. But the relief Aladda felt didn't last as seconds later, before the guards could catch up there was a loud bang from beside the princesses.

Aladda could here the guards shout, "Ambush!" before Aladda felt a sharp pain in his slender leg. He looked down to see a flaming hole in the ground beside his horse, and a large burn on the side of the horse and his leg. Aladda shrieked in pain, and then another explosion set off behind him and Jasmine causing the horses panicked sprinting off. Neither rider were able to calm down their horses, and it wasn't until minutes and miles later that the sand storm died down, and the horses calmed down along with it.

Aladda looked around where he and Jasmine had stopped and they could see nothing but sand. Jasmine looked worried, "I don't mean to worry you, but I don't know where we are right now, and I can't see Razoul or the others at all."

"Don't worry Jasmine, I'll figure out a way out of this, gah!" Aladda had tried to get off his horse, but his burned leg was having a hard time taking any weight.

"Oh Aladda! I'm so sorry I didn't notice, I-I'll go find someone somehow, don't move!" Jasmine got up to desperatly find help, but she didn't have to wait long, as seemingly out of nowhere a decrepid old man with a long beard and horrible looking teeth approached the two.

"Oh my princesses, how amazing that I run into you both here, I am ever so humbled!" The old man gave a large obnoxious vibe as Aladda gasped, for he knew this old man. For years ago before he'd ever met genie or had a real conversation with Jasmine, Aladdin had met this old man who took him to the cave of wonders and had trapped him in there to die. This old man was the evil vizier and sorcerer, Jafar. Aladda wanted to warn Jasmine but quickly realized that there was nothing he could do even if he told her, for he was an injured woman without so much as a stick to wave, and Jafar had all his evil magics that was probably responsible for the burns on his leg.

Aladda stewed while Jafar spoke to the girls. "I know of a way out of the endless sand and how to get back from Agrahbah, but I need your help to do so."

"I don't know if we should trust this man Jasmine." Aladda said knowingly to Jasmine, but the blue clad princess ignored her fellow princess, "What can I do sir? I need to get back as soon as possible to care for my sister."

"You need to go in there." Jafar pointed behind the girls and erupting out of the sand was the great mouth that opened to the cave of wonders, "I can not enter there, the Cave only opens for such 'diamonds' as yourselves. If you go inside of there and fetch me a lamp, I would be eternally greatful. And don't worry poor girl, your injured sister is safe in my hands." Jafar grinned a horrible grin that sent shivers down Aladda's spine in a way he'd never experienced before. He recalled Jafar's desire to make Jasmine his bride, and Jafar was looking at him now in the same way he'd looked at her.

"Jasmine, I really don't think..." But Jasmine cut him off, "Aladda, I can look after and make choices for myself, you don't have to protect me from everything! Let me protect you for once!" Jasmine said this like she was letting a huge weight off her chest. And before Aladda could argue back, Jasmine had sprinted into the cave leaving him alone with Jafar.

The two sat in silence, only sharing looks. Jafar with looks of lust, and Aladda with looks of hate. Not a word was spoken before they both heard Jasmine exiting the cave. It seems that since Abu wasn't in the cave this time there was no cave in. Aladda tried to get to the lamp to rub it, release Genie and fix everything, but Jafar was much quicker even with an old man's appearance. Aladda's only hope was that Jasmine had rubbed the lamp first.

114321111332.content:
Aladda cried out as soon as she saw Jasmine, "Jasmine! Don't give him the lamp! It's Jafar!" But it was too late, in an instant Jafar had lifted his disguise and bounded to Jasmine who had the lamp ripped from her hands. Jafar gave a moch bow and said in his slimy sarcastic voice, "Thank you oh so much my princess, but this will be the last time I will ever boy to you or your nosy sister." Jafar eagerly rubbed the lamp and a tower of purple smoke arose surrounding them all. Finally an intimidating voice that filled the sands erupted, "At last! After 10,000 years I'm free! Time to conquer Earth!" The voice turned back to Genie's normal joking tone, "JK everyone. No need to panic, now how about we start things off with..." Genie was about to get on a joking roll, but was stopped by Jafar.

"Stop talking Genie, for my first wish, I wish to be the most powerful sorcerer in the world!"

"Oh wow, so great. Much original." Genie said rolling his eyes, but he listened to his master and suddenly Jafar was glowing with a powerful dark red energy that scared both Jasmine and Aladda. They stood no chance. Jafar pointed his staff and said, "You are nothing but a simple thorn in my side." And a beam shot out of the snake's eyes that turned all the guards into roses. Despite the defeat, Jasmine took this as a good sign, "No matter what you do or how much power you have, the people will never support you."

Jafar squinted his eyes at Jasmine, "True, but if I am Sultan they will have no choice, especially with a lovely bride at my side." He glanced slyly between Aladda and Jasmine. Genie once again looked sour and mouthed, 'Sorry' to Aladda and Jasmine before shooting off another beam of magic. Aladda winced as the magic hit it's target.

How can we...fix everything. Oh father!" Jasmine said suddenly running to the sultan who was still a horse.

Genie floated over to Aladda, "Another example of a wife putting her man in place. You go girl!" Genie said as he snapped his fingers three times. Aladda smiled, it was the first time Genie had shown any of his old spirit.

Jasmine looked to Genie and with tears in her eyes asked, "Can you fix this? Make everything go back to normal."

114322222212111.content:
"Eric?"

The prince hears the voice of his wife calling for him from down the hall. He calls, "Yes, Ariel?"

Ariel walks into his room and says, "I just wanted to say goodbye before Melody and I leave."

Eric smiles as he walks up to his wife. Today was the 1st day of their monthly vacation in Atlantica. 6 months after the defeat of Morgana, his wife and daughter have always left the castle every month to visit Ariel's home under the sea for a whole week. Despite the fact Melody chose to live on land with her parents over her grandfather's offer of letting her live in Atlantica as a mermaid, Ariel decided Melody should visit her family under the sea from time to time, since she kept Melody's mermaid heritage a secret for the first 12 years of her life. Melody happily agreed to the idea since she loves the ocean so much and she loves being a mermaid with her mother. Eric agreed to the idea since he only wants to see his daughter be happy and the ocean was so much safer now that Morgana was gone.

So for the past year and a half, Ariel and Melody would leave the castle, have King Triton transform them both into mermaids, and they would spend the next week with their underwater family. Though every time they leave, Eric always finds himself lonely without his family by his side. His dog, Max, would always be there to cheer him up, but it just isn't the same without his loving wife and his beautiful daughter.

Which is why this time, when his father-in-law arrives, he'll ask something of him. Something he isn't sure he'll get.

Back to the present, Eric hugs Ariel close to him, and they kiss each other's lips. They break apart and smile at each other when they hear Melody say, "Ewww! Can't you guys do that with the doors closed?"

Eric turns to the doorway to see his now 14 year-old daughter standing there. He breaks apart from his wife and he picks up his daughter, and hugs her close to him. Melody hugs him back and says, "I'm gonna miss you, Dad."

He kisses her forehead and says, "Me too, Mel."

Ariel walks over to them and hugs Eric from behind. She lets go then walks in front of him and smiles. Eric says, "I love you girls."

Ariel says, "We love you too, Eric."

He lets go of his daughter, who runs out the door and toward the dock. Her parents follow her outside and they walk down to the end of the pier where they find King Triton waiting for them. Melody hugs her grandfather, who hugs her back and smiles at his daughter. He gazes at his son-in-law and bows a little.

Triton asks, "Are you two ready?"

They both say yes, and Eric steps back. Triton points his trident at Ariel and Melody and fires the golden magic at them. Eric watches as his wife and daughter are lifted into the air in a glowing golden light. Soon enough, the golden light encases both of them. As the light fades, he can see their clothes have vanished from their bodies, and their legs have merged together to form their tails. His daughter Melody has a bright red tail and blue seashells to cover her breasts, while his wife Ariel, as always, has a green tail and a pair of purple shells to cover her own breasts.

When the light fades away completely, they both dive into the waters and resurface a moment later to wait for Triton. Eric says, "Your highness, may I speak to your alone for a moment? There is something I must ask of you."

Triton raises an eyebrow, but he nods, and turns back to his daughter and grandfather, and says, "Ariel, Melody, go to the palace and wait there. I'm going to have a few words with Eric."

They nod their heads, and Ariel blows a kiss in his direction before she dives under the water. Melody stay behind for a few more moments and says, "I love you, Daddy!"

Eric smiles and says, "I love you too, Melody."

Melody dives under water and Eric turns his head back to Triton. His father-in-law says, "Now Eric, what is it you wanted to ask me?"

Eric says, "First off, what I'm about to ask you is gonna sound weird, and completely out of nowhere. And it's not meant to be a joke in any way, shape. or form. This is a very serious question."

Triton nods and asks, "Of course, Eric. Now what are you so serious about?"

Eric takes a deep breath, looks straight into his father-in-law's eyes, and says, "I want you to transform me into a merman."
114322222212111.title: 2 years after The Little Mermaid 2

1143222222121111.content:
Triton raises an eyebrow and asks, “What made you want to ask me this?”

Eric sighs and says, “Your majesty. I’m gonna be completely honest with you, every time Ariel and Melody leave for Atlantica, I miss them very much. Those two girls are my life. One week without them seems like a whole month to me. I just want to join my wife and daughter beneath the waves. Plus, I see the way they hug me when they come back. From what I can see, despite all the fun they have, every time they leave, they miss me very much. One week without me is probably like an entire year to them. I know for sure they would enjoy having me by their side.”

Triton nods and says, “I can understand your point, Eric. But I don’t think any of those are the main reason, is it?”

Eric says, “No it isn’t. The main reason is I want to see Atlantica for myself. Ariel has told me many things about her home, but there’s only so much you can learn by just hearing stories. People learn in many different ways, but experience is the best teacher. So I have to see her home for myself. How can I learn more about Ariel if I've never even seen her home? I’ve shown Ariel my world, but she hasn’t shown me hers. I feel that as her husband, I deserve the right to know more about her past.”

Triton smiles, and lays a hand on Eric’s shoulder and says, “Eric, I completely understand your reason, and I agree with you. If a man is to ever truly love a women, he has to know everything about her. In fact, it seems a little unfair that Ariel hasn’t invited you to Atlantica at all since she and Melody started visiting.”

Eric says, “So, you’re saying…”

Triton laughs and says, “Eric, it would be an honor for you to visit my kingdom, and I would be happy to transform you into a merman!”

He smiles and says, “Great! Then fire away!”

His father-in-law chuckles and says, “I’m afraid it will have to wait, Eric. Since you’ll be coming as well, I have to notify the staff at the palace that they should be expecting one extra guest. It may take a few hours to prepare the palace for your arrival.”

Eric says, “You know what? I haven’t told anyone in my palace that I’ll be leaving so that’s fine. When will you be ready?”

Triton says, “Expect me back by night time. By then I’ll be ready to take you to Atlantica.”

Eric bows and says, “Thank you for accepting my request, King Triton.”

Triton lifts up his chin, and says, “We’re family, Eric. We always have been since the day you married my daughter. I’m not just your wife’s father, I’m your father as well. So, please, no more of this ‘highness’ nonsense. Just call me Father.”

Eric smiles and says, “Thank you then Father.”

Triton turns around to dive back down when Eric asks, “Father, can you do one more thing for me?”

Triton says, “Sure, what is it?”

Eric says, “Please don’t tell Ariel or Melody about this. I want this to be a surprise for both of them.”

His father-in-law smiles and says, “Of course, Eric. Your secret is safe with me.”

Triton dives under the water and Eric heads back to his palace to inform his staff of his departure.
1143222222121111.title: Triton raises an eyebrow and questions why

11432222221211111.content:
After informing his staff, including Carlotta, of his trip to Atlantica, Eric walks back down to the pier and waits for King Triton to return. It is now nighttime and a full moon bathes the ocean in light. Eric gazes down at the water, wondering what it would be like to swim with his wife, and if he had a tail instead of legs. He smiles since soon, he won’t have to wonder about any of this. After 10 minutes, King Triton emerges in front of the pier and smiles at Eric. He says, “The palace is ready for your arrival, Eric. And Ariel and Melody have no knowledge of your arrival, just like you asked. Are you ready?”

Eric says, “I’ve informed the castle staff of my departure, so yes, I’m ready.” He holds his hands out to the side in anticipation of his transformation.

He says, “This isn’t gonna hurt, right?”

Triton chuckles and says, “No. From what Melody told me, the only thing you’ll feel is your legs tingle. Also, you should definitely close your eyes, since the light can blind you for a few minutes.”

Eric closes his eyes, lifts his hands into the air by his side, takes a deep breath and says, “Alright, I’m ready, Father. Transform me into a merman.”

Triton smiles and says, “With pleasure, Eric.”

Triton points his trident at his son-in-law and fires it’s golden colored magic at him.

Eric feels the magic of the trident hit his body, despite the fact he can’t see it. He feels his feet leave the ground as he is lifted up into the air. He can feel the magic encase his entire body from head to toe. During all this, he can’t help but feel giddy. At long last, he’ll be able to join his family in the ocean! Suddenly, he feels the magic enter and then transform his very body.

Like Triton said, Eric feels his legs tingle as they are pulled to each other, starting at his thighs. The feeling continues as his legs fuse into what will be his tail. While that happens, he feels all of his clothes vanish from his body, leaving him completely naked, though thankfully no one can see his body thanks to the light He can feel King Triton’s magic course through his body and veins, making him smile. The magic feels good. He really wants to see what is happening, but Triton’s warning reverberates in his mind, shutting up his thoughts. He feels his toes go numb as his feet join together, completing his tail, and he feels his new tail fin grow out.

Eric feels the magic dissipate from around him and he finally opens his eyes and stares down. Seeing his father-in-law smile at him, he dives into the water and feels the cool water refresh his body.

Blinking his eyes several times, Eric notices that he is breathing underwater. Looking down, he smiles when he sees that instead of his human legs, he finds a dark blue fish tail connected to his waist. He rubs his hand on his tail, noticing how smooth his scales are. He can feel the magic of the trident flowing through his entire body, making his smile grow bigger as he realizes he is no longer a human, he is now a creature of the sea. Eric smiles even more as he enjoys his new merman status. He thinks, ‘Ariel is going to love this!’

A shadow passes over him and he turns around to find his father-in-law behind him, smiling down at him. Triton says, “So what do you think, Eric?”

Eric says, “Well, it feels different having a tail instead of legs.”

Triton swims around his son-in-law and says, “Well, you make a fine merman, Eric! Ariel will love your new form! I guarantee it!”

Eric says, “Thank you again for turning me into a merman, Father.”

Eric yelps as he is grabbed by the sea king and hugged by his father-in-law. Triton holds his son-in-law against his muscular chest and bellows happily, “I told you before, we’re family, Eric! And that’s what family does for each other!”

Eric freezes in the bigger merman’s arms, but after a moment, he shrugs and returns the hug. After a few moments, they break apart and Triton says, “Well, we should leave now. Follow me, Eric.”

Eric says, “I would if I could, Father, but I don’t actually know how to use this thing.” He wags his tail and rubs the back of his head embarrassingly.

Triton chuckles, swims back to him and says, “Not to worry, Eric. I shall teach you.”

After nearly an hour, Triton finally manages to teach his son-in-law how to swim as a merman. Eric kicks his tail harder as he rushes to the surface. He jumps out of the water and smiles as he enjoys his new tail.

He dives back under the water, and sighs as he feels how cool it is. He turns his head toward his father-in-law, who looks at him with an amused look on his face. He says, “Are you done yet?”

Eric rubs his head sheepishly and says, “Sorry, I was having too much fun.”

Triton says, “Understandable. Melody told me she was like that her first time as well. Now, didn’t you want to surprise Ariel and Melody?”

Eric swims back to Triton’s side and says, “Of course. Lead the way, Father.”

Triton says, “Gladly.”

Eric follows Triton to Atlantica, kicking his tail as fast as he can. Eventually, Triton stops when they reach the edge of the city. Eric stops and floats alongside his father-in-law. Triton turns his head to Eric, gestures with his trident and says, “Eric, welcome to my kingdom, Atlantica!”

Eric gazes at the city and finds himself amazed at the beauty of it. He says, “It’s so beautiful. If I had known this is what your city looks like, Father, then I would have come here a lot sooner!”

Triton smiles and says, “Thank you for the compliment, Eric. Now follow me and I will take you to Ariel’s room in the palace where you’ll be staying.”

Triton and Eric swim towards the palace and Eric marvels at how majestic it looks. Eventually, Triton opens the door to Ariel’s room and gestures for Eric to swim inside, which he does. Triton says, “Stay here, Eric. I’ll get Ariel and Melody to come see you.”

Eric nods and Triton closes the door, leaving Eric to figure out what he says to his family when they see the new him.
11432222221211111.title: A few hours later

114322222212111111.content:
King Triton leads his daughter and granddaughter through the palace. Melody says, “Grandfather? Where are we going?”

Her grandfather smiles and says, “I have something wonderful to show you and your mother. Something that I believe you will both enjoy very much.”

Melody looks at her mother, who shrugs and continues swimming. Eventually, they make it to Ariel’s bedroom, and Ariel says, “Daddy, what are we doing here?”

Triton smiles and says, “Just open the door and you’ll see what I’m talking about.”

Ariel shrugs and opens the door to her bedroom. After the door fully opens, Melody and her mother open their eyes wide, and drop their jaws when they see Eric floating in the bedroom with a dark blue fish tail where his legs should be. He smiles as he finds his family surprised at his presence. He does a twirl and says, “So, what do you girls think?”

Melody is the first to react as she suddenly swims forward, hugs her father, and exclaims, “Dad! I never thought I’d actually see you here!”

Eric hugs his daughter back, and enjoys the moment he shares with her. As he holds Melody, he looks to his wife to find her still staring at him with her mouth agape. After a few minutes, they let go of each other, and Melody leans down and grabs the fin of her father’s tail, pulling it close to her face, still believing this to be a dream. She says, “Dad, are you actually a merman?”

Eric smiles and says, “Of course, Mel! How else would I be here?”

Melody lets go of his tail, squees and says, “Oh my gosh! There’s so much I want to show you, Dad!”

She grabs his hand and pulls him out of the bedroom, and they swim out of the palace. Ariel finally asks, “Daddy? When did Eric become a merman?”

Ariel feels a hand on her shoulder and turns around to find her father laying his hand on her shoulder, and smiling at her. He says, “Just about an hour ago. After you and Melody left, Eric requested that I transform him into a merman. So I did. After that, I took an hour to teach him how to swim with his tail. He asked that I don’t tell you or Melody. He wanted it to be a surprise.”

Not that she wasn’t complaining about her husband’s merman form, she asks, “Why?”

Triton smiles and says, “He says he wants to spend more time with you and Melody. Specifically, in the ocean.”

Ariel slowly starts to smile and she hugs her father, and says, “Thank you, Daddy.”

Triton holds his daughter against his muscular chest and says, “Don’t thank me, thank Eric. He asked me to.”

She says, “I mean thank you for giving him a tail.”

Her father says, “I know that you and Melody miss him so much whenever you visit us. So I knew you would love the surprise.”

He lets go of her and says, “Aren’t you gonna follow them?”

She says, “No, I’ll let Eric spend some time alone with Melody. It’s been a while since they did anything special together.”

Over the next few hours, Melody shows her father the entire city of Atlantica. Eric follows her along and smiles as she shows him all the wonders of the city. Near the end of the night, Melody starts to grow tired, and starts to drift to the ocean floor. Eric grabs his daughter in his arms, and Melody squirms a little and says, “It’s okay, Dad. I can swim back to the palace.”

Chuckling at his daughter’s stubbornness, he says, “No you can't, Melody. You’re too tired to swim on your own.”

Melody says, “How would you know? This is the first time I’ve seen you as a merman.”

Eric smiles and says, “Because I’m your father, and your mother tells me everything about you.”

Melody shrugs and wraps her arms around her father’s chest, and lays her head against his chest. Eric takes his daughter back to the palace, and after asking King Triton where her bedroom is, lays her in bed.

Melody looks up at her father and says, “I’m so happy you’re here, Dad. What made you want to come here?”

Eric brushes his hand through her hair and says, “I wanted to spend more time with you and your mother. So get some rest. Good night Melody.”

He leans down and kisses his daughter’s forehead and says, “I love you.”

Melody leans up, hugs her father, kisses him on the cheek and says, “I love you too, Dad.”

Eric pulls her covers up and leaves her room. He enters him and Ariel’s room, and finds his wife fixing the covers to their bed. Sneaking up behind her, he wraps his arms around her chest, lays his head on her right shoulder and says, “Guess who?”

Ariel turns around and smiles at her husband. He says, "I put Melody in bed, so it's just you and me now." Leaning forward, they embrace and kiss each other, and after they catch their breath, they gaze into each other’s eyes. Ariel takes his hand and leads him to the bed, where they lay down on their sides facing each other. Ariel moves her hand downward towards her husband’s tail, but she pulls it away. Eric grabs her hand and says, “It’s okay, Ariel. You can touch it.”

She resumes moving her hand down, lays it on Eric’s tail, and rubs it up and down his smooth scales. She says, “I never thought I would actually see you like this, Eric. I’ve always wondered what you would look like as a merman.”

He says, “I never heard what your thoughts are on it.”

Ariel says, “Eric, you are the most handsome merman I have ever met. If this is how I first saw you all those years ago, I still would have fallen in love with you.”

Eric lays his hand on her cheek, smiles, and says, “So you love it?”

Ariel smiles and says, “I love the new you just as much as the old you.”

Eric pulls her close, and kisses her. He rubs his tail against his wife’s tail, pulls away from her lips and says, “I love you, Ariel.”

Ariel says, “I love you too, Eric.”

The mercouple falls asleep holding each other, happy to be together.

114322222222211212222.title: An "Alice in Wonderland" Adventure?

1143222222222112122221.content:
On a sweltering savanna day, a young lion cub lied down beneath a shady bushy tree of a nearby waterfall/watering hole, a jungle like area a bit ways between Pride Rock and the Outlands. And the heat wave was the only threat that pervaded the Pridelands at the moment. Nothing the Lion Guard could do. In fact, the rest of the guard were off cooling down with their families and friends.

While the lion's den back at Pride Rock was cool and shady enough, Kion thought this little jungle like paradise was just as good and next to a water source to drink and swim in.

"YAWN!"

However, his body was yearning for some rest and long nap as his eyelids felt heavy. Soon, he fell into a deep slumber.

It wasn't until around ten minutes later that something unusual happened. His body glowed in a golden light and he began to shrink! Soon, he was the size of a grub with the world becoming much larger as blades of grass became as tall as trees. After a while, Kion tossed a bit before waking up, stretching and yawning as he got up. He slowly opened his eyes to discover his surroundings had drastically changed.

"What happened to me?!" he said looking around in panic of the bigger world he was in. Then, he heard a familiar voice as it flew pass him.

"I'm late! I'm late! I'm terribly terribly late!"

"Zazu?!"

It was the red billed hornbill yet as small as he was and didn't seem to notice or care about. He kept repeating about being late but for what?

"Hey, wait up!"

Kion called out as he attempt to catch up with the bird before he dove into a meerkat hole at the base of a nearby tree. The lion cub followed suit into the hole before tumbling down into it. After getting up and shaking off some dirt, he found himself at the beginning of a tunnel. Zazu seemed to have went farther ahead into as he couldn't see him anymore down the passage yet could still hear his mantra of being late. After going down some ways, he encountered a three way fork in the road and decided which path to take.

Which way did he go?
1143222222222112122221.title: Through the Meerkat Hole

11432222222221121222212.content:
Kion just went down the middle path, not wanting to wait any longer so he can catch up to Zazu. After some time, the pathway began to shrink as the corridor became cramped with his mane nearly scrapping the ceiling. How darker it was complicated things further.

'Maybe I should head back and take a different way.' he thought to himself. However, before he could turn around, his next step made him tumble onto a slide.

"WHOA!" he cried as he rode down with twists and turns around every corner. The ride took a few minutes before it dropped him into a room.

"OOF!"

He landed onto his back after falling a couple feet off the ground. Kion got up and shook off some dirt before taking a look at his surroundings. The room was rather large, like the size of a fully grown tree, made up of clay colored rock like the lion's den but unnaturally near smooth and perfectly square. The floor was a gray slate, also smoothed out. The walls were adorned with some cave drawings of various animals, similar to the ones Rafiki makes.

But what caught his attention was a smooth flat round rock in the center of the room as tall as he was. On top were two half coconuts, like it was perfectly cut down the middle. As he approached them out of curiosity, he discovered the halves were filled with some kind of liquid, the left blue while the right red. His nose caught a fruity scent from them. What would they taste like?

"I'm late! I'm terribly terribly late!"

A familiar voice broke him out of his thoughts as Zazu flew past him, now the size of a beetle, smaller than before. Now where did he come from?

"Huh? Wait!" Kion called as he tried to pounce at him only to miss as the bird flew into a door the size of a mouse hole. A feint click was heard afterward, locked.

'Now what?' he thought to himself as he looked around the room, looking for a way out.

He then looked back to the coconuts again. He was getting a bit thirsty and maybe a drink might help.

Which coconut did he drink from?
11432222222221121222212.title: Middle Path

114322222222211212222121.content:
Approaching the filled coconuts, he looked towards the one with the blue liquid. Sweet scent of berries filled his nostrils. He lapped at it once for a taste, then his eyes lit up on how tasty it was. Soon, he guzzled it down in a flash.

"Aaah." he sighed, wiping his mouth his paw.

Nothing seemed to happen at first, but soon he found his surroundings becoming larger as he shrunk down to Zazu's size from earlier. Now he would be able to fit through the door! He ran towards it and with his front paws he tried to push the door open.

"Ugh! Come on! Open!" he cried out as the door didn't budge no matter how much force he used, even trying to use his head and zebra kicked it. He noticed the handle and yanked it with his teeth yet still to no avail. The keyhole just below it stared at him and he stared back.

'Maybe something had to fit in there to open it?' he thought to himself. Looking around the gargantuan room, he spotted the black crude looking key, halfway over the ledge of the stone table. When did he missed that when he drank from the coconut? Still, how was he going to get it with his size dilemma? Just one obstacle after another.

While looking around for another solution, he discovered something at the corner of his right eye. East of him was some kind of crude treasure box/chest, reddish brown with gold outlines. Again, things felt like they were popping right out of nowhere and just confusing him even more so.

He approached the chest and with a paw flipped the lid right open to see that the chest was full of...
114322222222211212222121.title: One with Blue liquid

1143222222222112122221212.content:
Flipping the lid open revealed a whole load of chocolate chip cookies. Of course, Kion didn't know what these light brown discs with bits of black embedded into them, but they did smell really sweet. Odd that the chocolate chips on each cookie seemed to spell out some kind of message.

"Eat...me?" he repeated the cookie saying.

'Guess it is good and safe to eat.' he thought. He leaned in and picked up a cookie with his mouth, biting into it.

"Mmmmm!"

Very good and very chewy delicious! He went through half the chest of cookies like how Pumbaa scarfs down a bug buffet.

"Burrrrp!" Kion belched loudly.

He lied down onto his back to rest, patting his stuffed belly. However, a strange tingling sensation coursed throughout his body that became warmer.

What happens next?
1143222222222112122221212.title: C is for...

11432222222221121222212121.content:
The warmth spread throughout his body that gradually became intenser, causing him to squirm on the spot.

"Ugh, maybe I shouldn't have eaten too mu--WHOA!"

Kion was interrupted as he felt his body begin to expand and grow, his surroundings starting to shrink. Soon, the room became slightly cramped as he filled it, stopping just before his head hit the ceiling. He saw the key and grabbed it. Now he had his means to escape but another problem was apparent.

"Great! I'm too big to fit through!" he exclaimed in defeat. "Now what to do?"

What happens next?
11432222222221121222212121.title: Filling Up the Room

Instead of their dweeb brother standing there, a mature sexy woman wearing a white low-cut sleeveless dress that showed off her b-cup breasts with a pair of white high heels. Her thick lips were covered in pink lipstick with the pale eyeliner on her eyelids and a pair of triangular earrings hung from her ears. Finishing off her look, was her yellow hair now gelled slightly downwards.
"Hi girls." 'Johnny' greeted and motioned for them to approach. "Just call me Jenny and the deal?"

11531221.content:
"Are you sure this is the place, Azula?" Ty Lee asked in an unsure tone. "Why would he be living in the middle of the woods?"

"This is where the information I managed to obtain said that he could be found." Azula answered in a confident tone, "And besides, Ty Lee, you should know by now that my information is always good."

"Ugh, this place is so small and dingy." Mai chimed in as she looked at the house.

Deciding to put on a facade of civility, Azula approached the door of the rather puny and unimpressive house and knocked.

"Blast it, I'm coming!" came a voice from inside the house. A moment later the door opened and a man stepped outside. He appeared a bit disheveled as if he had been awaken from his slumber and his rather rotund form, balding and graying hair and older appearance would make one wonder what the Princess of the Fire Nation was doing here. "Darn travellers, just 'cause you got caught in one of my animal traps doesn't mean you can jus--" he stopped upon noticing the three girls, his eyes narrowing as he saw the manner of dress of the one in the middle. "Fire Nation..." he spat, "What do you want?"

"I take it that you are the man known as Liang?" Azula asked rather plainly.

The man eyed her and rubbed his long mustache and shorter-yet-pointed beard. "Perhaps I am and perhaps I ain't. What business would you three little girls have with Liang anyway?"

At that moment Mai and Ty Lee moved to either side of the man, flanking him. "As you are no doubt aware the Fire Nation is currently embroiled in a war of unification, attempting to bring the Earth Kingdom and Northern and Southern Water Tribes under its control."

"You'd be right about that girly, even out here in the boonies word travels." the man answered. "But that still doesn't explain what you want with Liang."

Azula smiled a very serpent-esque smile. "At present, though my nation's march towards conquest moves smoothly a spanner has been thrown into the works." she explained.

"The Avatar." stated the man, "Yes that piece of information too has reached all the way out here. A long thought extinct member of the Air Nomads returns and, with a group of friends in tow, has set out to prevent the Fire Nation's global conquest. A goal that is as foolhardy as it is noble."

"You are surprisingly in the loop." Azula commented still wearing her smile, "Yes, the Avatar has given us some... minor trouble. But more problematic is that he serves as a symbol and rallying point. Tabs must be kept on him and he must be hindered and, if need be, eliminated."

"And that's where Liang comes in I'm guessing." the man said, crossing his arms.

"Precisely." answered replied Azula. "Liang was one of the best spies and assassins the Fire Nation had seen until his retirement. His ability to get close to targets and gather information was unparalleled. Some say he could even change his appearance using a unique form of bending called Formbending to take on the appearance of another."

"Formbending eh? That's a term I haven't heard in at least twenty years." With that, the man looked to his left and right seeing the other two girls flanking him looking ready for combat. Smiling, he began a small series of movements. "After not doing this for so long I need to get the spirit energy flowing again." he said. Then with a stomp energy flowed around his body changing it; shrinking it and making it skinnier. His head gained a full head of brown hair in a long braid, his appearance became younger and more feminine and his clothes changed to a pink midriff exposing outfit.
