13211.content:
We find our heroes at the beach on beautiful Cinnabar island! Recovering after a blazing, eruptive battle with Blaine, the Cinnabar gym leader, Misty and Brock are relaxing with their pokemon in the sun. But Ash has other plans in mind!

"Come on guys! Let's get going to Viridian City!" Ash whines, still dressed in his sneakers, signature blue jeans, jacket, and trademark Pokemon League baseball cap. His shadow looms over Misty, who tips her sunglasses down the bridge of her nose and frowns at the boy interrupting her tan.

"What's the rush, Ash? We can't leave the island today anyways. The next ship destined for Viridian doesn't leave until tomorrow!" She replies.

The aspiring pokemon master groans. "Awww! How am I supposed to train out here on the beach with all these tourists around?"

Misty sits up and straightens out her red hair, which she untied to let roll down past her shoulders for once. The occasional sea spray keeping her hair damp and full. She is wearing her favourite bikini today, a two-piece number she bought while shopping in Celadon City. Sifting through her backpack lying next to her beach chair, she offers, "You can train with Starmie if you'd like. With your Squirtle, they make a pretty good sparring duo!" She giggles.

"That's more like it!" Ash cries, twisting his baseball cap backwards and reaching into his belt for a miniaturized pokeball. "Go, Squirtle!"

A few seconds later, the red light emanating from the pokeball materializes into Squirtle, the baby blue turtle pokemon. Misty sends her Starmie out, and they begin trading punches (or kicks, depending on your view of Starmie's starfish-like appendages) in front of them.

"All right! How about you, Brock?" Ash looks over to an empty beach chair next to Misty, its towel rustled up and slightly sandy. "Brock?" Scanning the horizon for signs of their other friend, they eventually locate the young man. Gobsmacked over an Officer Jenny patrolling the boardwalk nearby.

Heartshapes dancing around Brock's octagonal head, he blushes a brighter red than a Magikarp and drools at Jenny. "Ooooh! Are you the Jenny of Cinnabar Island?"

"Why yes I am!" Officer Jenny replies matter-of-factly, not paying much attention to Brock as she keeps her eyes on the beachgoers. She is straddling her motorcycle at the moment, with Brock standing in her way. She adjusts her cap and replies, "How did you know that?"

Brock slobbers, "Oh, I've seen the Jenny in Lavender Town and you're way way WAY prettier than her by far! There's no comparison whatsoever!"

Jenny's lips curve into a faint smile, trying not to let Brock's compliment go to her head too much. "Aww, thank you! She's my cousin."

Before Brock can say any more, he lurches backward and yelps in pain. Misty is pinching his ears and begins dragging him back to his beach chair. "Can't you see they're all the same! Stupid boys..." She grumbles, not listening to Brock's pleading of how this Jenny is so much different and better than the others.

"Hello Officer Jenny!" Ash approaches and waves at her. "What's up?"

"Chaaa!" Pikachu, always by Ash's side, pit-pats over and bobs its ears up.

"You cute little thing!" Jenny says, dismounting from her motorcycle to kneel down and pet Pikachu on the head. "It's always good to see trainers here on Cinnabar! Your Pikachu looks pretty strong!"

"Pi-kachu pi pi..." Pikachu closes its eyes as it enjoys being petted.

Ash laughs. "Yep! But it was my Charizard who helped me win this!" He shows Jenny the inside of his jacket. Sown on the inside hem are seven gym badges, the newest one being the ruby-red Volcanobadge gleaming in the hot sun.

"That's a Volcanobadge!" Jenny exclaims and congratulates Ash. She rubs her chin with a gloved hand. "You know, I can't be everywhere on the island at once. I'm sure you wouldn't mind looking out for suspicious activity, would you?"

"Suspicious activity?" Probes Ash.

"That's right. We're on high alert for suspicious individuals we've heard are prowling around the island. Eyewitnesses say they're members of the notorious gang Team Rocket! There are three of them, so be on the lookout!" Jenny explains.

"Three of them," Repeats Ash. His eyes flash in a moment of clarity. "Would one of them happen to be a Meowth by chance? And the other two about this tall," He raises his hands above his head, "And the man has purple-ish hair, the woman has long maroon hair?" Ash imitating his long-time rivals from Team Rocket. Jessie, James, and the English-speaking pokemon, Meowth.

Jenny places her hands on her hips. "Well, I'm impressed! How do you know so much about these individuals?"

Ash laughs, "Oh, them? They've been trying to steal Pikachu for months! They're complete losers, you'll have no trouble stopping them!"

She smiles, getting back onto her motorcycle and revving the engine. "Thanks for the tip, kid! In the mean time, let me know if you see them!" She notices a skateboarder passing her recklessly on the road. Crying out, "Hey! Walking only on the boardwalk! Come back here!" Jenny speeds away.

"I guess it's not easy living for everybody!" Ash chuckles, placing his hands behind his head in typical anime-pose and walking back to the beach. "Maybe a few hours at the beach won't hurt. Plus, I think we've earned it after winning that badge! Whattya say, Pikachu?"

"Pika-Chu!" Pikachu chirps, now wearing mini-sunglasses and holding a tiny glass of orange soda with a straw and a plastic umbrella.
13211.title: was out training.

132111.content:
Meanwhile, with Team Rocket....

"Professor Westwood, I presume?"

A balding, portly man in his sixties cowers in his office behind his desk. On the wall behind him are portraits of the previous five owners of the Cinnabar Laboratory, a rich, plexiglass facility overlooking the island bluffs on the sleepy, northern side of the island. Not having expected guests, Professor Westwood was caught completely by surprise when a Weezing burst through the glass doors and flooded the room with noxious gas.

The gas having dissipated, he refocused his bifocals on a trio standing before him.

"Who... who... who are you people?" He stammers.

"I 'tink 'dat's our cue!" The smallest of them, a feline-looking pokemon, snickered. Suddenly, a dramatic fanfare started playing from seemingly nowhere.

The first one, a woman with long, magenta hair flared out at the end into a small spiral, thrust out her chest revealing the prominent red "R" on the top of her uniform. She lifted one booted heel into the air in a coquettish fashion and flicked a 'peace' sign. "Prepare for trouble!"

The second one clasped a rose in his hand and flashed a menacing grin, smoothing his lavender hair which parted into a fringe in the center. "Make it double!"

"To protect the world from devastation!"

"To unite all peoples within our nation!"

"To denounce the evils of truth and love!"

"To extend our reach to the stars above..."

"Jessie!" Proclaimed the magenta-haired woman. Her eyes sparkling in a brilliant and evil sneer.

"James." Rejoined the lavender-haired man. Gazing over at the frightened professor with an uncaring glance.

"Team Rocket, blast off at the speed of light!"

"Surrender now, or prepare to fight!"

Finally, the pokemon, a common Meowth with an uncommonly nefarious demeanor, its charm flashing as it points a clawed paw toward the professor, sprung forward between its two human compatriots. The Brooklynite accent immediately noticeable about the Meowth's amazing human-like cadence.

"Mmmmeowth, 'dat's right!"

Professor Westwood dives beneath his desk and waves a white flag of surrender. "Please! Don't hurt me! I'm too young to die!"

"Silly old fool, we're gangsters not murderers!" Jessie snorts indignantly.

"Who does he think we are, anyway?" Asks James.

"Who cares?" Interjects Meowth. "He's gunna give up without a fight! Heh! Dis is too easy!"

"I'll give you whatever you want, just leave me in peace..." Westwood mumbles.

"That's what we like to hear." Jessie says, then striding forward to place her fists on his desk, she adds, "We're not interested in your crummy pokemon! You don't have anything rare that we want anyways. But... we want to access your invention room."

"Y-y-you can't do that!" Stammers Westwood. "All of my proprietary technology is in there! Most of it is still in the testing phase! Why, if I let just anyone take whatever was in there..."

"You can... and you will." Jessie replies. "Unless you want another mouthful of smog from Weezing, you'll give us what we want."

Westwood realises that he is outnumbered and outgunned. Reluctantly, he shows Team Rocket his invention room. They gag and tie him up, before making off with a large sack full of whatever pieces of technology they could apply their five-finger discount towards. Laughing to themselves at all the expensive gadgetry they made off with.

Hiding inside a drainage pipe below the laboratory, Team Rocket sifts through their stolen goods with glee.

"Look at all these doohickeys, ooooh! How complicated." James laughs, rotating and tilting what looks like a remote controller in front of his eyes.

"I don't know what this 'ting does, but it's so shiny I love it!" Meowth's paws roam around a golden disc about as large as a milk saucer.

"Gimme those!" Jessie snatches the items out of her comrades' clutches. "Who knows what you boneheads would do with these things!"

"Do with them? I thought we were going to sell them?" James asks.

"You idiot! Of course we'll sell them... but first I wanna see what these things can do." Answers Jessie. "Maybe we can use them to boost our pokemon's powers!"

"Then my Weezing will be the scourge of environmentalists everywhere!" James beamed, his starry-eyed vision of a Godzilla-sized Weezing rampaging through Cinnabar Island playing through his head.

"And my Arbok will finally capture Ash's Pikachu!" Says Jessie, envisioning Giovanni, the boss of all Rockets, bestowing upon her lavish praise and rewards as she hands over a hog-tied Pikachu. Receiving all the credit, of course, as her Arbok then captures the rest of those pesky twerps' pokemon one by one.

"Well, what are we waiting for? Let's try dese out!" Suggests Meowth.

Who should we follow next?
132111.title: Meanwhile, with Team Rocket....

132131.content:
Ash Ketchum was taking time out from his journey to return home after challenging and defeating the elite four. It felt nice to be back in familiar surroundings, to see his mother and Gary's sister again, and to sleep in his own, soft bed.

The sun was high in the sky by the time Ash was woken by the sound of his phone ringing. He fell groggily out of bed to answer it.

"Ah, Ash! Good to hear from you again. How is my Bulbasaur faring?"

"It's an Venusaur now, Professor Oak," Ash yawned.

"Wonderful!" Oak marveled. "Listen, while you're in town, maybe you could pop over to my lab. I've something here I wanted to show you."

"Sure thing, Professor. I'll be right over."
-----------
Ash was still yawning as he entered Oak's lab, straightening his cap over a mop of unruly bed hair. Everything was exactly as he remembered it. The pokeball containing Oak's last pokemon still sat on the table. Oak himself greeted him with a smile and a handshake and comments on how much he and his pokemon had grown. Finally, he led him over to his newest marvel...

The Metapod that had been Oak rocked gently on its curved edge, unable to move within its hardened shell, except for the eyes that fixated on the poke-change as it clattered to the floor just out of reach. Though it might as well have been four hundred miles away for all the Metapod could do about it. Ash picked it up and placed it in one of the many cages around the laboratory, before pocketing the poke-change and leaving.

His mind was working overtime as he descended the small hill leading up to Oak's lab. With the poke-change under his belt he could become the greatest pokemon trainer the world had ever seen, complete his collection of every single pokemon, or just have a lot of fun with it. Or all three, he grinned.

"It worked!" the Muk belched. It's voice, articulated by a semi-solid mouth, was slurred, but definately Professor Oak. "As you can see I was able to reverse engineer the Ditto's transform ability and construct this device, allowing me to take the form of any pokemonit has scanned." 132131112121121.title: "Can I try it?"

13213111212112111.content:
His body fell apart in chunks around him as his flesh disolved into a purplish-grey paste. He felt himself flow like raw sewerage around the table legs and into every crack of the tiled lab floor. It was an interesting sensation, being liquid.

The newly-minted Grimer stared up at the Muk. Somehow the transformed Professor no longer smelled quite so bad. Infact the stench of rotting garbage was suddenly sweet and fruity to his Grimer senses.

Oak gurgled happily. "This device is going to change everything. Still, we must make sure not to be captured," he warned. "If you're trapped in a pokeball that body will stay yours forever."

Ash gulped, imagining being a Grimer forever. Just then...
13213111212112111.title: A Grimer

132131112121121111.content:
The door's were thrown open by tremendous force. A charizard squeezed through the door frame, its huge armoured body hunched to fit. It's nostrils flared as the foul odour of the Professor and Ash hit it full on and it grunted in agitation, swinging the muscular, flame-tipped tail back and forth as its eyes fell on the two pokemon before it.

Gary stepped around it, with his eyes streaming, clutching his shirt to his nose and mouth. "Eugh! How did these things get in here."

"Grandson!" Oak roared, extending his huge arm as if to hug the trainer and sliding towards him. Gary took a step back, allowing Charizard to step between him and the revolting pile.

"Grandpa? Is that - How - what did you-?"

"Simple, my boy. I extracted the morphing abilities from a Diglet and used them to reconfigure mine and Ash's bodies into pokemon."

"Ash?" Suddenly Gary's eyes met Ash's with a ferocity that made the small Grimer want to hide somewhere small and dark and very far away. "That's thing-" he said, jabbing a disgusted finger. "-is my rival? The same one who shamed me infront of the entire Elite Four." A sadistic grin filled his face. "This is too good." Then he noticed the device still clutched in the Grimer's muddy fist. "Charizard, get that."

The wall of muscle and orange scales barreled down upon Ash. The pokechange was snatched. A fist the size of his head slammed his body, splattering him against the wall of the lab, spraying him over the tables of equipment. As he slowly and instinctively reformed, he could hear Oak angrilly berating his grandson. Oozing together to form larger clumps of goop, his sight eventually returned. Standing over him, holding the Pokechange in one hand and a Master Ball in the other, was his long-time rival Gary Oak. Behind him, Charizard beat and torched the Muk into submission.

"Evidently the same Miltank I scanned during her visit to the Breeding Centre. Certainly I don't remember the Whitney being this paunchy." She sighed. "Ash, I'd like to ask you to disable to poke-change for now."

"Huh?"

"Clearly I am now carrying a pokemon egg inside me. To turn me back now would destroy it, and that is something I can't allow."

"But that means you'll have to go through with the... the..." Ash had never been particularly involved with the breeding process, but 'egg laying' hardly seemed like the right term.

"Let's try to see it as a research opportunity," Oak said brightly. "You may keep the poke-change while I'm away. And for goodness sake, don't tell Whitney about this."

He craned his head back as far as his quadrupedal stance and bulb would allow him, but could still only barely look the giant Venusaur in the eye. He shivered slightly in the deep shadow cast upon him.

Venusaur glowered down at him. It sniffed the air. A thick vine emerged from its humongous flower and prodded the Ivysaur roughly. Professor Oak felt an uncomfortable sensation as the tentacle began to examine his almost-flowering bulb. "I-Ivysaur?" he ventured. His eyes opened wide as more vines emerged and began to snake down towards him, wrapping gently but firmly around his legs and torso. "Ash," he whispered. "Your Venusaur is very... friendly."

"Knew you'd get along, Professor! I'll leave you two get to know each other!"

Venusaur barely noticed its master leave as it pinned the female Ivysaur to the ground with its powerful vines. It butted its great nose against the sweet-smelling flower bud, which opened slightly to his touch, signalling its readiness for pollination.

"A-Ash!" Oak gasped, as his petals were parted by the huge beast. "I think I would like to turn back now! Ash? Ash!"

It's barrel chest swelled with bands of muscle that bunched as it turned, slowly, to stare at Ash. It's tail, Oak noted with some intimidation, was as thick around at its base as her own torso.

The Nidoking looked Ash up and down, before giving a dismissive snort from its nostrils. It turned back and its gaze locked onto the Professor. Despite her almost armoured condition, Oak found herself shrinking away from the fearsome creature, subconsciously crossing her arms over her bony breasts.

Unbeknownst to them, at that moment they were being watched by a trio with even less savoury intentions than the lustful-eyed Ash. Team Rocket pressed their faces against the lab skylight, gazing in wonder at the scene below.

"Wouldcha look at that," Meowth gawped. "We gots ourselves a rare pokemon factory down there! Think of all the pokemons we would give to Giovanni!"

"Think of all the crimes we could commit with such perfect disguises!" Jessie purred.

"Think of all the pokemon cosplay competitions we could win!" James sighed wistfully, receiving a swift smack to the head from the other two.

------
The ditto stared mesmerised again at the image before it. Ash was just about to flick the screen off when a sudden shattering of glass distracted his attention. As glass rained down on them, a hosepipe descended through the skylight, dropped inside the ditto cage, and began to suck. The ditto gurgled away up the pipe.

The familiar high laugh of Jessie echoed round the laboratory. "So long, twerp!" Meowth cackled, as his partners in crime raced to get their hot air balloon airborne. "See you and your girlfriend later!"

"We've got to get that ditto back! I can't be left like this!" Oak gasped.

"Weezing! Use Smokescreen!" Jame's Weezing belched a thick smog that covered their escape as they climbed higher over pallet town. In no time at all the wind had caught them. They could just make out the figures of Ash and the shapely Oak standing outside the lab, staring impotently up at the sky.

"I cants believes we actually did it!" Meowth said, tapping a claw against the side of the glass tube holding the ditto. The sensation of success was an odd one to him and his team members. "We's going to be billionaires!"

Don't be silly, he assured himself. In a few moments I'll be Ash, pokemon trainer, once again.

To his alarm, he felt his body distending to accomodate the amount of the other ditto's body inside him. And still it flowed inside him.

"Every day around this time Don Corneo gets a truck-load of food delivered," Aerith explained. "Lamb, fish, chicken, everything. If we can swap you with one of the animals you can sneak inside on the food truck."

"Yes. But I'll be food," Cloud pointed out.

1351.content:
Another explosion ripples through Rapture. You grab hold of a bulkhead as the floor buckles and the walls threaten to disgorge the atlantic ocean on your head at any second. The lights flicker off and on, and furniture topples around the blood-soaked office.

Slowly the aftershocks subside, but the distant, disturbed screams of the denizens of rapture do not. Your radio crackles into life.

"That last explosion stirred up the splicers something rotten," comes Atlas's voice. "You're going to have a hard time getting past them to Neptune's Bounty." He goes silent for a moment as though checking something. The baying cries seem to be getting closer. "You're in the office of Doctor Suchong. Sadistic bastard he was, but he wrote the book on plasmids. Search his office, would you kindly. There's bound to be something there to help you."

You ransack the office. In one of the drawers of his desk, you find a -
1351.title: Bioshock

13511.content:
Atlas buzzes in again as you pick up a box with the word 'morph' printed across it in green letters. "The box on his desk hold three experamental plasmids. They never finished testing so they never mass produced them."

You open the box and see one marked beast, another marked strength and the last on witch was so faded it couldn't be read. "The one marked 'beast' will turn you in to a half-human half-animal. The one marked strength increases one's strength and bulks up their physique quite a bit. The last one should say phantom and it allows the user to become invisible, but I'm not sure if its true or not. You'll have to experament with them to see how they do."
You nod then decide...
13511.title: Morph plasmid

choices: Use the Little Sister plasmid on yourself
13512.content:
"Rumour has it that Fontaine had hired Suchong to create a plasmid that could ramp up the supply of Adam," Atlas says, as you pull a syringe filled with a glowing pink fluid from the desk drawer. "That plasmid you hold in your hand was designed to turn regular Joes like you or I into those walking abominations, Little Sisters. Use that and the Big Daddies'll follow you round like lost puppies. They'll get through to Neptune's Bounty... for a price..."

There are footsteps and mad gibbering on the corridor outside.
13512.title: Little Sister plasmid

135121.content:
You drive the needle into your left wrist and press the plunger, forcing the viscous pink sludge deep into your veins, making them stand out as a network of bright pink lines. Your body begins to convulse painfully.

"Don't fight it. That only makes things worse."

Suddenly you're on your hands and knees, vomiting what feels like your entire body onto the floor. Fatty lumps and things that look disturbing like muscle fibre pass your lips. At the same time, you can feel the strength leaving your arms and legs. You can hear the bones in your skull grinding together as they contract upon your brain. Agonising pain slices through your head and you pass out.

You come to in a pool of your own...well, you. Slowly, painfully, you get to your feet. The plasmid syringe is still clutched in your right hand, only now it looks huge and your hand looks tiny, pale and fragile. The same goes for the rest of your body. You're now a Little Sister.
135121.title: Use the Little Sister plasmid on yourself

1351321.content:
"That's not a pretty plasmid," Atlas mutters in dark tones as you pull a syringe of greyish/green fluid from the desk. You drive it into the flesh of your left arm; near instantly the skin of your hand and arm begins to swell into hideous red blisters. To your horror, the blisters burst, releasing not puss, but wasps. Deformed red wasps swarm out of the holes in your skin and scurry over your arm.

The door slides open and a splicer charges at you, screaming and drooling like a mad dog. She vaults the desk with her butcher's knife already swinging down at your head. You fall back, dodging it, automatically raising your left hand to protect yourself.

The wasps fly from your hand in a dark swarm. The woman's screams become choked gasps as the insects flow into her mouth and burrow into her eyes, ears, and nose. She stops screaming. Her arms and legs sag as the muscle beneath is consumed. Her body folds in on itself, as the half-eaten bones snap like brittle twigs. Soon the woman is just a pile of skin. The empty shell undulates grotesquely as the bloated wasps crawl from her openings and dying within seconds upon the floor.

"Told yer it wouldn't be pretty," Atlas remarks. "That plasmid makes skinsuits. Makes 'em out of people. Go ahead, put her on. If yer lucky the other splicers'll leave you alone. If not... well..."

Afterwatching a woman being eaten alive you feel ready to be sick. But the empty skinsuit has been made; nothing will undo that. and it would be a waste not to use it.
1351321.title: Bodysuit plasmid

13513211.content:
Supressing the urge to vomit, you quickly strip out of your clothes and reach down to lift the skinsuit remains of the insane splicer out from the pile of her clothes. It's heavier than you expect; still coated in a layer of blood and perspiration, you note nauseously.

Gingerly you place your hands inside her mouth. To your suprise, the inside is not bloody, wet and raw. It has been sealed by some sort of fast-drying fluid secreted from the wasps mouths, giving the inside a dry and soft, but still wierdly organic internal lining.

You pull the mouth a little wider; the skin stretches with remarkably little resistance. Sliding one naked leg into the opening and down into the leg, the skinsuit seems to cling tightly to your thigh. Still warm. Gross. It's like sitting on a warm toilet seat. Taken up to eleven.

Slide in the other leg. You pause to examine your body below the waist; shapely, feminine if not exactly slim. It seems the wasps left the subcutaneous fat around the thighs and ass relatively untouched and the extra padding masks your male contours. The tattered bloody remains of a nylon stocking still clings to one of the skinsuit legs.

There's the sound of breaking glass outside and shuffling footsteps. Hurriedly you pull the skin up over your torso, sliding your hands into the skinsuits hands, and finally stretching the gaping mouth up over the back of your head. Her facial features slide smoothly into yours like a mask. You peer out through her empty eye sockets, breathe through her lips. The shuffling grows closer. You can be squicked out later, but for now...
13513211.title: Put the bodysuit on

choices: Jump out from behind the desk and attack
135132112.content:
The handle of the door rattles. With no time to change, you dive over the desk and drop to the floor, leaving yours and her clothes and all of your weapons in a pile on the floor. You push yourself as far into the dark legspace beneath the desk as you'll fit and silently curl up. To your suprise, you feel the sensation of your breasts being squashed as you curl your legs up to your chest, and the icy-cold tyles of the floor beneath your naked butt. The skin feels so tight against your own that it barely feels like you're wearing it at all.

You don't have long to considering this before the door opens and the shuffled footsteps step into the room. It sounds as though they're rummaging through your possessions, metallic clinks of somebody inspecting your guns. Shit. You should have given yourself a weapon, even the wrench.

The noises stop. The footsteps approach the desk slowly and you have to choose: face him unarmed or stay hidden.
135132112.title: Hide

1351321121.content:
Your heart pounds as the footsteps come closer, but you force your body to calm. Though you may be unarmed you're certainly not defenseless. Even though you may have the outward appearance of a woman you have a man's strength - something they won't be expecting - and the element of suprise. Bracing yourself, you leap out from behind the desk, naked and screaming, and launch yourself at the intruder.

It is a male splicer. The power of your attack seems to take him unawares and he stumbles back over the mound of clothing as you lay in to him with desperate punches. But his knee swings up hard in to your chest. You bend double, winded and gasping for breath, as the splicer raises his arm at your face.
1351321121.title: Jump out from behind the desk and attack

choices: The splicer gives you a command
13513211211.content:
As you bend over, gasping for breath, a ball of green slime erupts from a slit in the splicers palm and hits you square in the face. The thick fluid enters your eyes, nose, and mouth; and you choke further as some of it enters your throat. You find yourself on all fours, head buzzing from the cobination of exertion and hypoxia, your entire body convulsing for a single good breath, while you spit and retch up the acrid fluid.

"Son of a bitch," you gasp in a voice ill-fitting your apparent body. Your hands find the wrench within the pile of disgarded clothes. Grasping it, you swing upwards at the splicer's face.

Halfway through the swing, your muscles sieze. Unable to move even an inch, you watch as your assailant calmly removes the wrench from your frozen hand.

"Jack?" the radio crackles with Atlas's voice. "Jack, are you okay? Be careful around there - some of the splicers are using Hypnotize Plasmids. If you're not careful, they'll make you their puppet. Or worse."

Thanks for the head's up, you think silently, a prisoner in your own body and somebody elses skin.

13522221.content:
"Thank you for helping me clean the castle, Luigi," Princess Peach said warmly.

During her most recent... absence from the castle, the Toads had been trapped once again in the walls and the whole place had gone undusted for a long time. Her beautiful halls lay under a cover of dust and cobwebs.

"It's a-no problem, Princess" Luigi replied. "With-a this contraption I'll have it clean in no time. And I get rid of your ghosts too!" On his back he hefted the Poltergust 3000, lent to him again by Professor E.Gadd.
13522221.title: Out of body experience

135222211.content:
He activated and siezed the nozzle with both hands as the high suction nearly yanked it out of his grip. The nozzle twisted this way and that, slurping hungrilly, and the plumber wrestled it towards the dusty drapes.

"See, Princess, it works perfectly!" he said, as the Poltergust stripped the drapes of their dust... and then gobbled the drapes down afterwards. To his horror, the suction searched around for something else to suck. The nozzle leapt out of his hands, implanting itself firmly into Peach's bosom.

Peach screamed as the powerful suction tore away her dress and sucked her soul from her body, She found herself being pulled down the pipe and into the storage backpack of the Poltergust 3000.

"Princess!" Luigi gasped. He hit the Off switch, but the damage was done. Her shrill scream echoed away down the halls. Her body stared blankly, soulless.

Princess Peach, her body at least, just stared vacantly at walls, smiling in an unfocused way, either unaware or uncaring that her dress had been ripped away and she now stood in her royal underwear. Luigi felt himself blush as he moved closer to inspect her. Physically she seemed fine.

1352222121.content:
He activated and siezed the nozzle with both hands as the high suction nearly yanked it out of his grip. The nozzle twisted this way and that, slurping hungrilly, and the plumber wrestled it towards the dusty drapes.

"See, Princess, it works perfectly!" he said, as the Poltergust stripped the drapes of their dust... and then gobbled the drapes down afterwards. To his horror, the suction searched around for something else to suck. The nozzle leapt out of his hands, planting itself firmly inside Peach's mouth.

She tried to scream as the powerful suction sucked her in from the inside-out, but her lungs were the first to go, followed swiftly by her organs, bones, and muscle - all pulled down the pipe and squashed into the storage backpack of the Poltergust 3000, a mangled mess of still-conscious body parts.

"Princess!" Luigi gasped, as the Princess, what was left of her anyway, collapsed like a deflated balloon inside her clothes. He hit the off switch on the now-heavy Poltergust. Hurrying to the intert pile of fabric and flesh, he pulled the empty skinsuit of Peach out from the folds of her dress.
1352222121.title: He activates it - sucking out Peach's insides

choices: Try to reverse the suction on the vacuum.
13522221211.content:
"Princess! Say a-something!" Luigi cried in vain at the lifeless princess suit. He started to sobbed uncontrollably into it. He had really messed up big this time. The princess of the kingdom sucked up into a vacuum and left as a wad of skin and clothes. When Mario found out about this he was going to...

"Luigi? Princess Peach?" came a familiar Italian voice from down the stairs outside of the room. "Are you two up-a there?"

Too late. Mario was going to find out. Luigi could only imagine what his brother would do, what he would say. This wasn't going to be like a typical kidnapping with Bowser, something that could be solved simply enough. For all Luigi knew, he had killed Peach.

He had to do something fast or things were going to end really badly.
13522221211.title: A big problem

135222212111.content:
For some reason, the time Luigi had posed as the princess in the Beanbean kingdom to fool Cackletta and her ilk. If it could work once, it could work again right? The skin could (heaven forbid) serve as a costume until he had the time to sort things out and fix it all. He just had to fool Mario until he had time alone.

Luigi had to move fast, Mario would be here any moment. Wasting no time for second thoughts, the green plumber stripped down and tossed his clothes under the princess's bed. He reached for the Peach skin and choked a sob.

"Oh a-Princess...Please forgive me."

There was no zipper or hole in the back, meaning the only way to put on the skin was the same way all Peach's insides came out. Through the mouth. Thankfully, by some sick fortune, the skin was stretchy and flexible like elastic. Luigi had no trouble prying open Peach's gaping maw so that he could fit both his legs inside.

From an outsider's perspective, the scene would have almost been comical. A flattened eyeless Peach would have appeared to be swallowing up poor Luigi whole. Luigi had no time to think of such thoughts, however. He began to pull up the skin so that it began to cover most of his awkward form.

Though it didn't quite fit over his body, he couldn't help but enjoy the soft creamy feeling of Peach's skin as it clamped down tightly against his. He was a bit taller than Peach and had a heavier frame, though not quite as heavy as his brother's. And by the time he pulled the face of the suit over his own- golden hair still attached to it like a wig -he looked like a naked Peach who had lost all of her womanly assets and binged on cake for the last few months. It was going to have to do, Luigi only prayed Mario couldn't tell the difference.

A door came at the door. "Princess? Are you a-in there?"

Luigi cleared his throat, trying to do his best Peach impression as possible though it came out somewhat hoarse. "Just a minute Mario, I'm changing."

"Ma'ma mia." Replied Mario, blushing on the other side of the door.

Getting the dress on wasn't that difficult after putting on the suit, Luigi had plenty of experience with it already. He even put on the lacy gloves, stockings, and underwear though most of it was too small for him. Placing the tiara on top of his head, Luigi got a look at himself in the mirror. Peach's pretty face was there, except she had a large bulbous nose instead much like his own. Good as it was going to get. With a heavy sigh, Luigi opened the door and prayed Mario wouldn't notice.
135222212111.title: Stand-in Princess.

Mario only stared silently, his mouth hanging open slightly, as Luigi opened the door and stepped out onto the staircase. Neither dared talk as they descended the staircase, Mario running his cap over in his hand, Luigi twiddling his satin gloved thumbs.

They took a quiet stroll in the garden. The sun was shining, the birds singing, but Luigi couldn't help but think of the Poltergust and its contents in the castle, and what he had done. Mario couldn't help but think about the bulbous pink nose sitting in Princess Peach's face.

Eventually Mario cleared his throat carefully.

Mario blushed awkwardly at the discomfort he had caused the Princess. But something was certainly odd. He had never seen the Princess so quiet before, although admittedly most of the times he saw her she was screaming for help from over Bowser's shoulder. Mario grabbed the Princess by the hand. "Then come on. I'm-a sure Princess Daisy will be overjoyed to see-a you again."

Talk about side stepping a pothole to fall off a bridge. The last thing Luigi needed right now was to not only hide the incident from Mario but hide it from Daisy as well. Thankfully what remained of Peach was still stuck in the vacuum tucked neatly away in the side of the bedroom. So long as Daisy didn't notice anything was amiss, he'd be just fine. Later...

13522221211112111.content:
"Don't worry, Princess. Professor Gadd's-a gonna get-a you all fixed. You just relax and Luigi sort everything out." Luigi gently patted the metal storage cylinder on the back of the Poltergust 3000 as he lugged the apperatus down the central staircase. It had been heavy enough with incorporial entities inside - with the majority of a body in it he was having to drag it along the floor.

The Poltergust 3000 clunked off the bottom step and he began to drag it towards the double doors - Just as they were thrown wide.

"Hi! I'm Daisy!"

"Oh no!" She had gotten here fast. Silently he cursed the warp pipe network.

"Peach!" Daisy screamed in happiness, pulling the faux-Princess into a tight hug. "I'm so happy you're back! Mario said you weren't feeling well so I came right away!" As she released the hug and finally looked him in the face, her hand leapt to her mouth in shock. "My! You look terri- erm, you look... tired!"

"I'm fine! But there's something I have to do." Luigi said desperately, trying to maneuver around her. Daisy tutted and pulled the Poltergust from his grip.

"Nonesense! You can hoover up later. What you need is a make-over." With royal determination, she took his hand and dragged him away.

135222212111121111.content:
Luigi found himself dragged back up the stairs to the royal boudoir. He stood surrounded by her signiture excesses of pink frilliness while Daisy looked him over with a sad, sympathetic eye. "Oh, Peach. You must have had such a terrible time. You look positively dreadf- I really hope Bowser didn't mistreat you. Arms up."

Obediently, as he wont to do at any of Daisy's requests, he raised his hands above his head, and was horrified to see her grab his dress and pull it over his head, leaving him with nothing more than the Princesses' lacy stockings and underwear to preserve his modesty. Daisy gave a sharp intake of breath.

"Well... at least he fed you well," she said half-positively. She opened a side-door. Luigi quivered in fear at the sight of the room beyond. Golden light shone from within, illumining walls of elaborate, silk gowns; row upon row of pink shoes; racks sagging under the weight of countless jewel-encrusted tiaras; cupboards overflowing with frilly underwear.

"I think we'll start with this," Daisy said matter-of-factly. Luigi took a step back. The corset she held up to him was no less terrifying for the lace and glorious heart motif that adorned it.

Instantly the corset contracted around his chest like a silk vice. The air rushed from his lungs in a non-Princessly groan. There was the crackle of gristle or possibly ribs. He gasped down a breath as the contraction slowed. He gasped down a breath, but found anything more than the tiniest sip of air sent pain coursing through his ribcage. His head swam and his stars flittered across his vision.

Daisy clapped giddily. Luigi, going slightly blue in the face, forced himself to look down.

The corset clamped around his torso had forced his waist to pencil-thinness, easilly matching Princess Peach's proportions and beyond. The rest of his torso had been forced the only way it could - upwards, swelling out his false bosom to absurd proportions, with more lung tissue than breast tissue, he suspected. The smooth, pale flesh bulged out over the top of the lace rim of the corset.

Mario was still blushing when Luigi opened the door and stepped out. He was shorter and wider than the Princess, and the hem of her dress trailed heavilly around his legs. But Mario didn't seem to notice. he saw the familiar lights of adoration fill his eyes as he doffed his cap and said softly, "Princess. You get-a more a-beautiful every time I see you."

"Th-thank you, Mario," Luigi sqeaked, bunching handfulls of the ill-fitting dress in his gloved hands as they descended the stairs. Normally a very clumsy man, he was suprised at the ease with which he walked in the Princesses dainty heels.

Newly awaked bustled around as they walked the palace halls together, carrying large feather dusters with them and kicking up large clouds of dust wherever they worked. Slowly the place was returning to its former glory, although without its Princess it would never truly be how it was, Luigi sniffed sadly.

Peach waited. Occasionally she twitch a little and make a noise half-way between a gurgle and a groan.

The skinless thing that almost resembled a Koopa Troopa moaned in thanks.

13523.content: Is it Bowser King of the Koopas
13523.title: Other

choices: Bowser chooses the Magical Items table.
135231.content:
It was another horrible day in the Koopa Kingdom. Bowser, king of all Koopas, was sulking on his throne, a full month after his last defeat and foiling of kidnapping Princess Peach. It had been an elaborate plan as well, Bowser had pulled out all the stops. A distraction in the Mushroom Kingdom's Castle, raiding the magical stars, reviving the painting worlds before enlisting the help of many of his other allies. But once again the red plumber had smashed his way through all obstacles, grabbed Bowser by the tail, and sent the Koopa King flying off into a lava lake once more. And here Bowser sat, scowling and alone, the lava burns slowly healing. Just like the last time. And the time before that. And the time before that.

Every. Single. Time.

It was clear to Bowser he was going about it the wrong way. The blunt force method was no longer an option, they either saw him coming and got too prepared for it to work, or Mario just smashed his way to the Princess. No, it was time for a different way. Stealthier. Sneakier. A way that got him into the Mushroom Kingdom and close to Peach with anyone realizing it. But Bowser was, admitingly, a rather large reptile. The ground shook when he walked and his brightly colored scales and shell made him stand out like a Yellow Yoshi in Donut Land. There was no way that Bowser would ever be able to able to pull off a stealthy infiltration as he was.

That was why, in the last week after pulling himself out of the lava, gone about finding the smartest Koopas in his kingdom and tasking them to finding a way to make him look different. It had taken some time, but results were expected today.

Or else.

As if summoned by his thoughts, the massive red doors at the far end of Bowser's throne room swung open, and a single Koopa Troopa in a white lab coat came hustling in as fast as it's little legs could carry it. After crossing the huge throne room, the Koopa finally stopped before Bowser's throne, where the turtle collapsed out of breath.

"Well?" Bowser growled, refusing to give the underling a chance to rest. There would be no rest while Peach remained in her castle and Bowser remained alone. "Have you done what I asked?"

"Guh" The Koopa Troopa gasped as it pushed itself up off the floor, "Y-yes, sire. Puh-Please follow me!" The lab-coated turtle then turned and headed back the way it had entered. Bowser glared at the Troopa's backside for a moment before rising out of his throne and stomping along behind it, just close enough to intimidate the much smaller creature.

After a few minutes of silent walking through the halls of his castle, the lab Koopa and Bowser entered the small laboratory that held the newly formed 'Koopa Kingdom Research and Development Division', essentially a spare dungeon that had been rapidly converted for scientific purposes. On one of the three tables were various items; one was entirely mechanical, strange devices that lay in a pile of loose parts. Another was a maze of glass and vials of glowing liquid, while another was covered in a variety of magical items from across the world. Not that he trusted these Koopas to figure out anything that his sorcerer, Kaemk, hadn't already failed to discover.

"My lord Bowser" The lab Koopa intoned, pointing to each table with a stubby clawed hand, "Each of these tables contains a multitude of items that will aide in your quest to infiltrate the Mushroom Kingdom. They will change you from your current, majestic form to sometihng that would arose less suspicion. They await your choosing"

Bowser merely swatted the lab Koopa out of the way as he lurched further into the room, staring at each of the three tables intensely as he made his choice.
135231.title: Bowser's Transformative Journey

1352311.content:
"This one" Bowser growled, pointing a large clawed hand at the table filled with glass and different colored liquids sitting in racks of vials.

"Excellent choice, my lord" The Lab Koopa said, recovering from Bowser's shove and shuffling towards the potion table. Upon reaching the table and gesturing to the entire assembly, the Koopa said "Please keep in mind that, because of the short time table, these potions have yet to be fully tested. There may be some adverse effects"" The Koopa Troopa picked up a rack of green potions, holding them out to Bowser, "These potions will change your form, disguising you a native of the Mushroom Kingdom!"

The Koopa set the green rack down before picking up a rack of red potions. "These will change you into an object. You will retain your mind and some ability to move, but you will otherwise by inanimate". The Koopa set that rack down, and picked up another one, filled with blue liquid.

"This potion will give you powers similar to a Boo, allowing you possess someone or turn invisible" The Koopa said, before setting it back down.

After a few minutes of consideration, Bowser reached out and grabbed the...
1352311.title: Bowser chooses the Potion table.

13523111.content:
"This one" Bowser growled, grabbing the rack of green, potion filled vials. "What better way than to hide in plain sight! They'll never suspect someone that looks like them to work against them!"

"Excellent choice, sir" The Lab-Koopa said, "Please ingest one of the vials. Taking all ten at once could have severe and adverse side effects"

Bowser nodded and set the vial rack down as gently as he could, using his claws to pull out a single vial of the green glowing liquid. The Koopa king looked down at the Lab Koopa, giving the smaller reptile a fanged grin before downing the potion in one gulp. Once out of impatience, the other because the potion itself tasted like bitter, sweaty Chomp Chomp breath.

"UGH!" Bowser groaned, but then he felt the power flowing through him as his body began to tingle, the changes beginning.
13523111.title: Green potion, Body Transformation

choices: Bowser goes to Kamek for a solution.
Bowser decides to drink ALL the green potions at once.
Bowser mixes the green potion with another potion.
135231111.content:
"Hmmm...I don't feel anything happening..." Bowser growled, staring down at the bottle in disappointment before crushing it in his massive, scaly hand. He turned and began stomping towards the chamber exit before suddenly his entire body felt as if it was catching on fire!

"GAHROAAAAAAAAR" Bowser, well, roared, spewing a wall of fire out as he fell to his knees in agony, eyes clenched shut in pain. He felt something inside him move, then something else, and something else! The pain was simply too much and Bowser, king of all Koopas, passed out. The lab-Koopa, it's cowardly instincts kicking in, tossed it's clipboard into the air and scuttled out of the room as fast as it could.

He wasn't conscious for any of the changes. His skeleton shrinking as it lost mass, his scales draping over his body like a tent for mere seconds before it too began to change. The muscles began to constrict around his smaller skeleton, most of the muscles mass fading away into soft fat that pooled on his chest and rear. The scales covering his body began to merge with one another as his formerly colorful body began to turn lighter. His face reshaped itself as it lost it's saurian features, becoming more mammalian. His eye sockets cracked and shifted as they shrank in size, tears pouring out of his eyes as they shrank as well, their internal structure snapping apart and forming back together as their color changed to deep blue pools. His much smaller head extended away as his neck grew in length, narrowing as his voicebox shifted and contorted. His shoulders slimmed and rounded as his back curved outward, then inward dramatically, shoving the twin masses of fat on Bowser's chest outward. The massive spiked shell shimmered as it too morphed, shrinking and curving until it fit perfectly against Bowser's new spine structure as the spikes shrank lengthwise but grew in width, now only a handful covering the new shell. His hands, once incredibly large shrank down, slimming as his fingers split apart into five smaller ones as his claws thinned and narrowed. His powerful legs slimmed as well, leaving two powerful yet delicate looking legs as his feet shrank and reformed into those of a human. His tail, once short, club-like and powerful grew outwards, shrinking in overall width as it gained length and dexterity, twitching on it's own accord as the nerve endings running through it fired off uncontrollably.

Bowser's mane of fiery red hair at it exploded in length, running everywhere as it doubled in length and size as it became fuller, lusher, brighter as blonde hair chased the red to the very tips of his new luscious locks. His horns shrank and repositioned themselves as well, losing most of their curve as they shrank to just above Bowser's new hair. Last but not least, Bowser's male anatomy melted away as a very feminine slit appeared.

As the changes ceased, all that was left of Bowser was a large breasted Koopa version of Princess Peach, laying unconscious on the cold stones of Bowser's castle, draped in large, spike covered leather bands that lay comically over the /very/ female body he now possessed. Several minutes passed before the coldness of the stone floor seeped far enough into Bowser's changed body to rouse him back to consciousness.

"AAAAHHH" Bowser screamed, jerking himself upwards and finding himself horribly tangled in the spiky bindings he had worn just a few moments ago. "AAAAAHHH!" Bowser screamed again, confused by the high pitched sound of his own voice and how weak he felt, staring down at how changed his body was. He had expected to to look different, but to /feel/ so different scared the Koopa King. After a moment of being comically tangled, the newly female Bowser managed to extricate himself from the ruins of his wardrobe and pull himself to his feet, admiring at how complete the process was.

"It...It worked!" He, she screamed in triumph, and then covered her much smaller ears in pain as her new voice echoed off the high walls and ceiling of her castle. After the echo faded away, she released her ears slowly, feeling them out with her new, much smaller fingers before sliding them through her voluminous hair, before running them across the mountainous breasts that now dominated her body.

"This is amazing!" She whispered to herself, but just as she was about to call her plan a complete success, she felt a painful twinge in her stomach.

"No...NOOOOOO!" She screamed as the pain returned in full as her body began to swell and change, her breasts caving in as fat was redistributed into muscle, the burning pain as her skeleton began to lengthen once more, the intense itchiness as her fair, unmarred skin began to devolve back into individual scales. It was too much, and Bowser feel to her knees once more as the pain overtook her brain and forced it to sleep as the massive reversion to her body commenced in full. Bowser's sex reverted as his male genitalia sprouted from the female slit, his fingers and feet swelling as bones merged back together. His skull cracking apart frighteningly as it grew once more into a saurian snarl as the shell on his back swelled to it's former deadly prominence.

And then the reversion was complete, and Bowser lay there, sprawled on the castle floor for nearly an hour before a wandering Goomba bumped into him, causing his eyes to snap open.

"GRAROOOOOAAAARRR!" Bowser once again roared, rearing up and letting loose a column of fire, the Goomba wisely waddling away as fast as it could of it's two stubby feet as Bowser slowly picked himself up off the floor of the castle.

"It...It worked! But it needs to be longer!" Bowser snarled, gazing back down at his natural body in disgust."What's the use of changing bodies if it doesn't last more than a few minutes!? And the pain! The unacceptable pain!"

Bowser stomped back over to the potions, the lab-Koopa nowhere to be seen as the various chemicals bubbled and sizzled away in their vials. Bowser ignored most of them, searching and finding the flask that held the glowing green potion that he had ingested earlier, prompting his change.

"You..." he growled, picking the entire flask up and swirling it's contents, small crackles of magical energy popping from the liquid's surface within, "How can we make you work..."

He could go to his court sorcerer Kamek. Perhaps some additional magic would make the potion work? Or maybe the dose he drank simply wasn't enough, perhaps Bowser had to consume the entire potion in order to make it last longer. Or maybe if he combined the potion with another one...

Bowser was, admittingly, not much of a scientist, but he was prepared to take the chance in order to defeat MArio once and for all.
135231111.title: Bowser becomes Bowsette.

choices: Bowsette suddenly feels...dizzy. Maybe...Maybe Mario could help her?
Bowsette commences her plan without hesitation.
1352311111.content:
Bowser sneered at the bubbling concoctions. He could easily down the remaining potion, or try his hand at alchemy himself, but the Koopa king knew better than to risk it. He was a ruler, a fighter, he did not have the scientific knowledge to try his hand at changing the spell to make it last.

But he knew someone who could. Cradling the large flask in both of his huge claw tipped hands, Bowser made his way out of the lab and through the castle, Goombas and Koopa Troopas scattering before him for their own safety. Eventually Bowser made it to the tower where the Koopa Court's sorcerer, Kamek, resided.

"He'll fix the potion. Or else" Bowser growled as he pushed open the heavy wooden door and made his way up the long, spiral set of steps, eventually stepping up into the magical reptile's study, which was adorned with all manner of strange items and novelties. Kamek himself was asleep on a hammock that was held aloft by two of his numerous floating broomsticks, his large blue cap pulled down over his eyes and beak as he snored loudly.

"AHEM!" Bowser said loudly, and tried not to chuckle too heartily as the much smaller Koopa jerked upright in surprise, unbalancing the floating hammock and tumbling to the floor.

"Who dares!?" KAmek snarled as he extricated himself from the floor, but his angry demeanour changed the instant he saw Bowser looming over him. "Oh! Oh, my lord Bowser! What a pleasant surprise! I was...um, just testing out a new type of broomstick when I must have, uh, accidentally cast a sleep spell on myself!" Kamek dusted off his blue robe and straightened his cap before shuffling over to a massively overcrowded desk and grabbing his magical wand. "What can I do for you today, my lord?"

Bowser rolled his eyes as he carefully set the glowing green potion on the tower floor. Kamek immediately waddled over and peered into it's contents, the flask reflecting off the Magikoopa's goggles.

"This potion will allow me to transform into a disguise that I will use to infiltrate the Mushroom Kingdom and finally defeat it and that cursed plumber once and for all!" Bowser boomed, his voice shaking the small chamber of novelties and magical items.

"So why have you not consumed it and gone about your plan?" Kamek asked, giving the flask a gentle shake and analyzing the sparks of magic that frothed within.

"Because it only lasts for a few moments before I change back into my glorious self!" Bowser flexed an enormous arm for Kamek, who seemed unimpressed. Bowser frowned and ceased flexing, crossing his arms together and staring at the magikoopa, "So I command you to make the potion last longer. Forever, if need be!"

"Forever, my lord? Surely you jest" Kamek scoffed, frowning up at Bowser, "But when would you change back?"

"There's plenty of other potions, plus the new lab-Koopas can make more of this, if need be. You can help them" Bowser growled, losing his patience.

"Well, I suppose I could most likely create the effect you desire...But I'd have to brew up a entire new potion from scratch. Those lab-Koopas you brought on, they're unskilled in the magic arts, I'm surprised it worked at all! I will need a week, at best, to make what you need"

"NO!" Bowser roared as he reached forward and grabbed Kamek by the scruff of his robe, "NO MORE WAITING. FIX IT OW!"

"Yes! At once my lord!" The much smaller Koopa screamed, trying his best to sink into his robe and shell, "Just don't stomp me!"

Bowser dropped his sorcerer to the floor and grinned, "That's more like it. So, how do you plan on fixing it?"

Kamek coughed and dusted himself off once more as he regained his composure, tapping his goggles with his wand as he struggled to come up with an idea to please his master. Re-creating the potion was the safest bet, but that would take time, and Bowser lacked the patience.

"Hmmm..." Kamek said, pacing around his study. Tanooki suit leaves hung dryly on the wall, a frog suit folded up in the corner, different Koopa sheels in various stages of dissection, a go-kart engine floating on a small cloud of magical geometric shapes. He stopped to admire a Super Mushroom, one that he was planning on trying to fuse with a super star to combine the ffects of both.

Combine the effects of both...

"AHA!" Kamek yelped, grabbing the mushroom and racing back over to the potion flask, "My lord, what does the potion turn you into?"

Bowser felt his cheeks grow red as he remembered the feeling of massive breasts swinging from his chest. He couldn't tell Kamek what it did. "It, um, changes me into a human!" The Koopa King muttered, but that was all Kamek needed to hear.

"Ah! Well, if we combine the semi-permanent effects of a super mushroom..." Kamek took the large mushroom, whose eyes almost appeared to be eyeing the potion nervously, "And combine them with the potion..." Kamek ripped the super mushroom's stem off and tossed it into the potion, cackling with glee as the stem melted away instantly, turning the potion yellow before shuffling off towards a collection of random items with the mushroom cap. After a moment of sifting through the collection of what Bowser took to be junk, Kamek pulled out a small golden crown, with eyes of it's own staring blank ahead.

"And if we combine this with the crown" Kamek shoved the mushroom cap into the crown's interior and waved his wand at it, a low WOOP WOOP WOOP resonating through the chamber as he fused the two items together. "Ahh, perfect! Now all we have to do is..." Kamek raced back to Bowser and the flask, trying comically to lift the glass container despite the fact it was almost as large as the mage himself. After a moment of furious grunting, Kamek staggered back and pointed at the flask with a dull claw.

"Uh, if you would help, my lord?" The magikoopa asked, giving Bowser a sheepish looked. Bowser merely rolled his eyes and picked the flask up, staring at Kamek.

"Ah, good good!" Kamek squealed, setting the fused crown on the floor of the chamber, "Now my lord, please pour the potion onto the crown!"

"And this will make it do what I want?" Bowser grumbled, tipping the flask over so that the potion began pouring out. The two Koopas stepped back to avoid any splashes, but the crown seemed to absorb the yellow liquid.

"Yes! You see my lord, potions are edible, they fade through the body as your body processes it. But as we all know, costume items only fade when they are removed via blunt force. So by combining the super mushroom with the crown, we made it a costume, and by letting the mushroom absorb the potion, the effects of the potion will now last forever! Or until something hits you hard enough. But yes, FOREVER!"

The remnants of the potion trickled from the empty flask an onto the crown, which began to glow for a moment before turning inanimate once more.

"And there you have it, my lord Bowser, your disguise is ready! A rather ingenious solution, if I do say so mysel-" Kamek boasted, but was interrupted as Bowser let loose a roar of triumph and swiped the crown from the floor, knocking the magikoopa backwards.

"FINALLY! MY MASTER PLAN IS FUFILLED!" Bowser roared, and placed the crown on top of his head.

*POOF*

And there, in a matter of painless seconds, stood the incredibly buxom beauty that Bowser had been before, massive breasts swaying gently, magnificent rear and tail sticking out from beneath an elegant form fitting shell, red tipped golden locks flowing almost to the floor, and slim fingers sliding up and down their new body with ease. The only difference was that now, Bowser was fully clothed, a long black dress, a dark reflection of Princess Peach's, flowed outwards as heavy blue gems accented the outfit, Bowser's signature spiked leather bindings and chokers fitting securely around his slender neck and wrists.

"My...My lord!?" Kamek said, before fainting from surprise.

Bowser...or rather, Bowsette grinned, a single fanged tooth sliding over supple lips as he...she felt the power of her new form course through her, this time for good.
1352311111.title: The Crown.

13531.content:
Chell crawled carefully along the glass tube. Turrets and cubes whizzed by within the pipe, buffeted along on the flow of air. Twice she almost slipped into the acidic green goop below her, but the Handheld Portal Device always remained firmly in her grip.

"Your not even going the right way." The voice of GlaDos echoed off the grimed walls of the outer facility. "You should have turned left. It's funny actually..."

Chell fazed out the insane A.I. as she approached a bend in the pipe. There was a wall ahead of her and a ledge to her left. If she could get a portal onto the ledge and another onto the wall... it would be a tricky jump, but maybe-

With a pained creak, he glass tube suddenly gave out beneath her. She was sucked inside, forced along the tube by the airpressure, tumbling end-over-end, glass shards stinging her face and arms, with the laughter of Glados ringing in her ears.

The tube turned downwards and opened out, depositing her into a small chamber.

"I told you you should have turned left," Glados taunted her. "Welcome to the..."
13531.title: Portal

135311.content:
"You will be cubed and then there will be cake!"

It was hard to see in the ambient light emitted from the portal gun reflecting off the grey metal walls of this tiny room but were the walls... moving? Then she felt cold metal press against her back as the wall behind her came to meet her. The room was shrinking! She fired portal after portal into the walls, but none took purchase and even if they had, they would only lead her back into the cube. She was trapped!

Soon it became impossible to stand. She found herself forced into a crouch, then a huddled ball as the walls closed in on all sides. Chin-to-knees, she waited for the end. She felt bones break and flesh deform as the pressure became too much.

The walls stopped, but didn't retreat. She couldn't move. The operational end of the portal device dug painfully into her flesh.

Suddenly there was light as a laser beam cut a perfectly heart=shaped chunk from the centre of each wall, giving her a moment's breath before they were all plugged with heart-shaped pieces of rose-tinted glass. The laser arms sealed the glass to the metal and then scoured down the edges of her tiny cube prison, melting the metal together, sealing her in for good. With her face crushed up against the glass, her eyes against the heart-shaped window, she couldn't look away as a automated claw lifted her box and carried her through the facility.

The claw passed a wall of polished metal. For a second, the caught sight of herself reflected in it - a cube, half of a metre wide, each of it's six faces adorned with a heart.

GlaDos's voiced echoed inside the metal. '"You are not a good person. You know that, right? But you make an excellent cube." With that, the robot arm deposited her. The pneumatic diversity vent labelled 'Cube Storage' below sucked her in hungrilly.

13533111121111121.title: Ass Effect

135331111211111211.content:
Suit ruptured. Air venting. Lungs burning. Alchera wheeled overhead as Commander Shepard tumbled through silent space. The stars began to go dim as his brain starved for oxygen. He was dead by the time he hit the atmosphere.
-----
When he woke, though a little suprised to find himself alive, he knew something was very wrong. He could barely open his eyes; they refused to focus on the stark white roof overhead. He was laid out; though he could barely feel the table beneath him. Arms were too weak to lift their own weight; legs... he couldn't feel his legs at all.

He tried to take a breath; it gurgled in his burnt lungs like a death rattle.

"My God, Miranda, I think he's waking up," a man said.

"Damnit, Wilson. He's not ready yet! Give him the sedative." A woman entered his vision. She stared down at him with sympathy. "Shepard, don't try to move. Just try to stay calm."

"Not ready yet?" the man scoffed. "There's no way we can repair this sort of damage. Heart-rate's still climbing. Stat's are pushing into the red zone. It's not working!"

"Another sedative! Now!"

With an almighty effort, Shepard was finally able to will movement into his body. He caught sight of the burnt, broken, dismembered body that was now his, before the sedative flowed through him, sending him to blissful oblivion. The woman's face - beautiful, chiselled, perfect - was the last thing he saw.
135331111211111211.title: Shepard awakes.

1353311112111112111.content:
"Wake up, Commander!" Shepard suddenly heard a man's voice calling his name. "Shepard, get your ass out of this bed now, this place is under attack!"
Shaking. But body responding. He felt whole again. Had it all been a dream?
"Damnit! Get moving, now!
Distant gunfire heard through several bulkheads.
"There's a pistol and armor in the locker at the farside of the room. Move it!"

Instantly, Shepard sprinted over to the locker, opened it...
And got the shock of his life!
In the small mirror on the locker's door, he saw not the reflection he was used to. No, instead staring back at him was the woman he had seen when he woke before.

His Alliance special forces training took over and he grabbed the black Onyx Armor with orange stripes from the locker - only to realize it was a woman's model.
And suddenly a horrifying realization ran through his mind.

"What..." Shepard brought out puzzled, just to realize it was not his voice either.

Quickly he looked down and saw two globes of flesh sitting on his, or rather her, chest.
"No time to explain, suit up. Now!" Shepard heard the man's voice barking an order at him.

And so he, or rather she, did. Luckily, men and women's battle armor were designed equally, so Shepard had no trouble getting it on, except from the unused feeling of the weights on her chest getting pressed into the armor's front cups.

A pistol lay beneath the armour. She grabbed it. After all the confusion it seemed reassuring to hold. Only...
"This pistol misses something!" she said as she found out that part of it was gone.
"Crap... You need to find and insert a thermal clip into it. But not now, get into cover, those canisters in front of the door are going to explode!".

A canister near the door was venting gas. Shepard dived behind an upturned table just as it exploded. The door slid open. Vaulting over the table, Shepard sprinted through the smoke and out the door. A thermal clip lay discarded on the floor. Slamming it into the pistol, she felt it come alive again.

1353311112111112111222.title: Brain in a jar

13533111121111121112221.content:
Miranda had given everything for Cerberus. Quite literally. Months into the Lazerus Project, and with no hope of recovering Shepherd devestated body, she gave the ultimate sacrifice to see it succeed - herself.

In surrendering her exquisitely engineered body, Miranda had been relegated to nothing more than a brain and a set of eyeballs floating in a jar of fluid. It sat, stewing, on a laboratory bench, hooked up by wires to sensors that gave her a rudimentary grasp of her surroundings, but unable to act as the vibrations and explosions rocking the ship brought the jar and her vulnerable form closer and closer to the table edge. She wished that she still had eyelids to close, so that she wouldn't have to watch as her fluid-filled container teetered on the brink.

An explosion blew open the door to the medical lab and her beautiful body dived out. She watched her old self with a sense of loss and longing, as it put two bullets clean through the heads of the advancing security bots. To her horror it began to run past her trapped, vivisected form without even a glance.

"Shepard! Wait!" she cried mentally.
13533111121111121112221.title: Brain in a jar

135331111211111211122211.content:
Her brain was a soft, pink pin-cushion of electrodes penetrating deep into every lobe of her brain. As a perfect specimen of both genetic engineering and biotic powers, the cerberus scientists she had once worked with had been working on what was left of her for days. Ostensively for science, although she suspected some of them had volunteered out of some grudge built up due to her demeaner during her time as their boss. More than once, after the hearing centers of her brain had been poked full of tiny metal needles and linked up to acoustic sensors, had she heard the phrase 'ice queen' spoken in bitter tones.

It had been torture watching them treat her as nothing, when she had once been so much more. Nonetheless she was gratefully now that one eager scientist had seen fit to wire her up to a speaker, even if it was so that they could hear her responses when they poked the electrodes in. The words that came from the speaker were robotic and distorted but they caught Shepard's attention. "Over here! Please!"

Shepard approached the laboratory bench, diving behind it as further mechs sprayed the area with bullets. The speakers squeeled in electronic anguish as shots wizzed around the brain-filled jar that teetered just above Shepard's head. One bullet grazed the container, finally sending it over the edge.

"Shepard! Help!" the speaker squeaked.
