141331111221.content:
Selecting a non-descript uniform, Dumbledame slipped it on. The skirt was a little embarrassing, and she didn't like the way the jumper clung to her curves. She felt as if she were on display.

She noticed there wasn't a house crest on the jumper, and before her stunned eyes she watched. Stitching started to dance as it shifted and moved. A rainbow of colours, sometimes, emerald and silver, other times, red and gold, then the gold and black of Hufflepuff, before moving to the two tone blue of Ravenclaw.

Albus only realised she was holding her breath, when it settled back into the familiar red and gold of Gryffindor. Her old house, ahe felt a certain sense of pride that he still belonged there. There were some things in his past... that he could rationalise, some actions that were necessary... Even as she thought of them, a sense of shame and regret filled them.

She smoothed out some imaginary wrinkles from her uniform, and set about selecting a wand to add to her disguise. There were three sitting on a shelf. One by one she placed them in her open palms, and examined them magically.

Each one hovering up from her hands, taking on a glittering golden glow, as their strength, weaknesses and alignment were revealed.

A flexible oak wand, with Dragon heart string.

A rigid teak one, with Centaur mane core.

Lastly, a very flexible willow wand, with a Pheonix feather centre.

She needed a reliable one to help her find the Elder Wand.

141332.content:
The battle of Hogwarts had marked the end for a very dark chapter for the Malfoy family. They were left abandoned and ostracised by many wizards. However, while the defenders of the school, were glad to be shot of Draco and his kin. There were others... former friends who felt that their behaviour was a betrayal, and that such things should not go unpunished.

Even now almost a year later.

Draco heard the silence fall whenever he walked into a room. His results were ... not great ... but good enough to get him into University.

It was only afterwards that he learned that both Hermione Granger and Harry Potter were studying there too. His new social life was not a giddyingly busy affair. It pleased and irked him that the Weasley boy, a pure-blood, hadn't got in. He was off studying dragons with his brother or something like that.

Draco was glad to be far from the isolation of the highlands and the wilds of Hogwarts.

'Beansprout University' was situated in London. Even to muggle eyes it was a baroque building, that twisted people's vision making them dismiss it. The magic of the buildings allowed some rather slender towers and eccentric walkways. The spell around the grounds, made it appear almost mundane to those bystanders and less perceptive types.

Draco was unaware that he was being observed.

The student register flicked to the page he wanted, and he saw that Harry Potter was working to be an Auror. While Hermione's studies were less clearly defined, which Draco took to mean as being more experimental.

He wasn't interested in them... or so he told himself, but he didn't want to run into them by accident. He had heard of a parchment or something similar that could track a magician's position. That sounding like a promising line for him to follow.

141332321122111111111111111111.content:
When the unfamiliar woman used Dumbledore's password and entered his office, Albus made sure to project an air of kind indifference, while inside steeling himself against possible attack. The woman's raven-black hair and teacher's robes made it clear her station, despite the fact that the headmaster knew every teacher in the school, and this buxom woman was not among them. "How may I help you?" he asked, keeping his voice level.

To his immense surprise, she rolled her eyes at him and fixed him with a haughty stare. "Really, Albus, I'm surprised you haven't noticed by now." It was then that Shirley Snape explained to the headmaster everything that had happened that day, and the nature of the box of cursed chocolates she held in her hands. When all was said and done, Dumbledore was sitting down, his withered blackened hand on his face. "Yes, it's quite the pickle, isn't it?" Snape asked.

"That certainly is one way to say it," the headmaster replied, running through all the ramifications in his mind. "I can feel the curse in my mind, now that I know of it. Young Draco and Ronald have already begun to be rewritten in my memories. I can recall their students lives as both how they were and how they are, and I'm sure something similar will soon occur with Ms. Granger are yourself. I'm confident that were I not aware of the curse, I wouldn't even notice things had ever been different, the same way I'm sure every other member of the school is slowly adjusting to their new world. What is far more troubling is how this all affects our plans."

Shirley couldn't stop herself from snidely saying, "Your plans, you mean."

Albus continued speaking, as though he hadn't heard the comment. "Dru is no longer a Death Eater and has no plans to kill me whatsoever, and soon I'm sure the mission itself will be retroactively removed from existence. Depending on your new memories, this could put you in an unusable Unbreakable Vow or to have never made in it the first place."

Once it was clear he was waiting for her to speak, Snape thought through her new history and supplied, "It seems I'm still your agent with the Death Eater forces, but I'm trusted far more than I was before and I haven't been forced to make any Unbreakable Vows whatsoever."

For the first time in the conversation, Dumbledore smiled. "Perhaps we shouldn't look this gift horse in the mouth? In a way, a Dark Mark is itself a curse, a powerful one developed by Lord Voldemort himself. But these chocolates, through their own mysterious magic, completely removed them. Is it possible..." Dumbledore looked at his cursed hand, the sign of his impending death. "I do not fear death, and yet I feel the world may need me longer than my mistake would normally allow." Finally, he let out a sigh and sat up, walking over to the box of chocolates on his desk. Looking through them, he finally picked out one with a peanut butter filling. Snape watched, her eyes wide, but she did not dispute his choice.

The Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher watched as Albus ate the chocolate, and his aged form shrunk, twisted, changed, until standing in his place was a completely different person. She appeared to be someone in her late teen years, possibly her last year at Hogwarts, though her stormy eyes contained the same wisdom they had before. The youth's tanned and ruddy-hued skin peeked out here and there from a robe that was only half worn, and underneath were athletic clothes, a shirt and shorts. The girl had lost several inches in height but was still tall for a girl, and while she wasn't exactly curvy her athletic build would still turn the right heads. Oddest of all was her curly red hair, of a hue much darker and deeper than the ginger Weasley's.

Suddenly, Snape looked at the girl in front of her in genuine recognition as the new memories appeared in her head: this was Alvira Dumbledore, headmistress of Hogwarts. The most brilliant witch in Britain, the archenemy of the Dark Lord, and the one who held Snape's life in her hands. Her youthful appearance was due to a once-in-a-lifetime enchantment that happened entirely by accident that left the seventeen-year old Alvira eternally young. She'd never looked hard for a way to disenchant herself, enjoying the perks of the energy of youth and the practicality of never growing old.

The same information was running through Alvira's head, and once she felt caught up on her new life, she smiled at Snape. "Now now, Professor, don't gawk. I know I'm cute, but I'm still your boss." With a wink and a spin, Alvira moved to leave the room. "To be young again! I haven't felt the urge in decades, but I think I'll go for a jog around the campus, see how the students are doing."
141332321122111111111111111111.title: Alvira Dumbledore, the Sporty Headmaster

It was the morning after Chopper had joined the crew, and the Straw Hat pirates were sailing out towards Alabasta. Nami looked around, surprised that Sanji wasn't fawning over her like he usually did. She went towards the front of the ship and asked Vivi, "Have you seen Sanji anywhere?"

The princess frowned, and shook her head. "No, I haven't seen him all day, actually. Is he missing?"

Nami sighed. "Well, we're at sea, and he was here yesterday, so unless he decided to take a midnight swim I think he's fine. He's probably just in the kitchen, cooking breakfast." With that, she walked into the kitchen, only to find it empty. This was getting weird. Sanji didn't do much else besides cook and flirt with them. That comment settled it. Before either could react, Sanji grabbed the fruit with one hand and ate the whole fruit in three bites. His face went blue, and he fell to the floor. Chopper changed into his Heavy Point and kneeled over Sanji, worried.

15133222221111211121.title: Love Bomb, Class Bicycle

choices: Izuku Midoriya, to be Inverted into a bimbo bitch.
Ochaco Uraraka, to be Inverted into a competitive dude.
151332222211112111211.content: Who is the next target?
151332222211112111211.title: One Down, More to Go

choices: He's become Izuki Midoriya, teenage hero with a bitchy attitude.
He's become Isami Midoriya, a young woman hero who's a bit of a bimbo.
1513322222111121112111.content:
Once it became clear that their task has been settled, The Inverter worked on picking out their next target. Inverting Bakugo had brought the world more niceness, but now their may be too much. So balance everything out, they selected Izuku Midoriya as their next target, unaware that they carried the quirk One for All inside them. This time, the Inverted wore civilian clothes, blending in with the crowd, and made sure to touch the young hero, almost casually, on the train ride home from school one day.

The Inversion would be slower and more subtle this time. No collapsing, no hospitals. Izuku went home like normal, if feeling a little dizzy, ate dinner and went to bed. Once he was asleep, the changes began in earnest, his body malleably altering more and more until he no longer resembled who he once was.
1513322222111121112111.title: Time to Hit the Protagonist

choices: Deku controls himself, and they walk to school quietly.
Deku lets the bitchiness flow through him, pissing off Bakugo.
15133222221111211121111.content:
The first thing Deku noticed as he awoke the next morning was that his ceiling looking pinker than usual. Getting up with a yawn, he looked around his room and immediately noticed how different it was. There were no posts of All Might, no memorabilia, instead the entire room was cute and feminine, with a much larger dresser and a make-up table. Still feeling sleepy and confused, Deku approached the table and saw someone different reflected in it. He was a girl now, looking cute and dainty with a sexy edge. For some reason, he wasn't freaking out, and instead searched the room. It wasn't long before he discovered he still owned a lot of All Might stuff, it was just more subtle or more hidden.

A tear-filled conversation with his mom and a call to the school later, it became clear to everyone that Deku had been Inverted as well, and Bakugo showed up at his house to walk him to school, she herself knowing what it's like to be Inverted. As Deku walked outside in her school uniform and saw Bakugo, he immediately found himself not liking what he was seeing. What a bitch, jerking off all the guys, being such an easy slut. She should know her place, especially when she isn't even that attractive. Deku had never thought things this malicious before in his life, and he was stunned by having them go through his mind, but he also felt...like he enjoyed the thoughts?
15133222221111211121111.title: Izuki Midoriya, the Prickly Successor

choices: Within the month, Deku is the top bitch in the school.
Deku is suddenly propositioned to join the League of Villains.
151332222211112111211112.content:
Feeling high on how it felt to just think this way, Deku couldn't stop himself from saying, "Well, well, well, the class bicycle is here. Sorry Kacchan, looks like you won't be sucking my dick anymore. I know you won't be able to find another like it, but I'm sure you'll enjoy the search." It felt so weird to be saying it, his feminine voice coming out haughty and rude, but it also felt amazing, like he was proving that he was the better of the two.

The words hit Bakugo hard, and she started to retort, her eyes teary, but Deku held up an open hand. "Please don't, I'm not in the mood to smell you cum-scented breath right now, loser." Then Deku started walking to school without her. Left to her own devices, Deku was in deep internal conflict. On the one hand, that was really mean of him, and it clearly hurt Bakugo. On the other hand, it felt absolutely amazing, better than Deku had felt at any time in his life, except perhaps for when he was saving the lives of others.
151332222211112111211112.title: Embracing the Inner Bitch

choices: Izuki decides to start trying to date Todoroki, causing an internal struggle.
The Inverter decides to Invert another student, but who?
1513322222111121112111121.content:
Within a month, the girl once known as Izuku Midoriya was now a completely different person. Izuki, who now refused to be called Deku, was at the top of the social latter. Where Deku had earned friends through his genuine kindness and earnest attitude, Izuki had a different method. Instead, she buttered up those in good social standing, such as Momo and Todoroki, while treating those she saw as beneath her like garbage, unleashing a torrent of well targeted insults at them. Her talent as a hero was just as strong, if not even better, as it seemed as though her control of her quirk was far better than before.

As for how things were playing out inside her head, things were quite complicated. Her instincts towards being a popular bitch were so strong that Deku had stopped fighting them weeks ago, instead actually relishing the joy of tearing down Mineta and other losers like him. Still, she resisted where she could, but it was getting harder and harder to do so. More and more, she found herself preferring her life as Izuki. After all, she was confident in herself, beautiful, and on the path to being one of the top pro heroes in the country.
1513322222111121112111121.title: Queen Bee

choices: All Might has One for All again.
Someone else in Class 1-A now has One for All.
15133222221111211121112.content:
A sudden flash of warmth alerted Deku that something was wrong, and he turned his head just in time to see someone skulk back into an alleyway. Running over, he barely caught a glimpse of whoever was there, but as the heat throughout his body increased Deku knew who he'd seen...The Inverter. While he was still conscious, Deku pulled out his phone and called All Might. He got his voicemail, and quickly said, "All Might, I was just hit by The Inverter! I'm at the corner of Hoth Avenue and Amidala Lane, and I don't think I'm going to be conscious much longer, send help!" His words proved prophetic, as just as the call ended, he fainted.

Deku awoke in the middle of the night, lying in a hospital bed. Recovery Girl was there, looking forlorn, and when she saw he was awake she left to fetch someone. His body still feeling numb, Deku slowly pieced together and remembered how he'd gotten here, that he'd been Inverted. But into what? All Might entered in his skinny form, looking gravely serious. He was holding a mirror, and turned it to Deku. The woman in the mirror looked a lot like him, but plainly feminine, with a cute freckled face and long black hair. He reached out to take the mirror, noticing how feminine his hands looked as he did so, and All Might told him, "I'm sorry, Deku, but it seems you've been Inverted into an adult woman. From all available evidence, this Inverted version of you is still a big fan of heroes, works office jobs...and has no quirk, not even One for All."
15133222221111211121112.title: Isami Midoriya, Regular Woman

choices: Bakugo, whose new personality makes her the obvious choice.
Uraraka, who is doing her best with the weird news.
151332222211112111211122.content: Who in the class is the new One for All?
151332222211112111211122.title: A New Number One Hero

choices: Uraraka is somewhat upset that Deku never told her any of this.
Uraraka is determined to be the new Symbol of Peace.
1513322222111121112111222.content:
[NOTE: So, I completely forgot to double check where things were going two chapters back when I made the chapter about Deku becoming a young woman, which is why she (so far) isn't very bimbo-y and why the continuity from one to the next makes no sense. Sorry for that, my bad.]

Still trying to grasp everything that was going on, his head still trying to recover from the strain of Inversion, Deku asked, "S-so what happened? Don't tell me that One for All is just gone now! All Might, I'm so sorry, I should have been more careful after what happened with Kacchan and-" Before Deku could continue his rambling apology, All Might laid a large hand on his shoulder, which sent a weird shiver through Deku's body, and pointed behind him.

As if on cue, Uraraka came out from behind the hospital curtain and walked over, and Deku immediately saw something was different about her. The teenage hero he knew was, well, soft. While she was definitely fit, Uraraka had a very round, curvy shape to her, but now she looked stronger, with visible muscles in quite a few places. She looked conflicted. "Hey, Deku. So...I have One for All now, somehow. I guess when you got Inverted, someone had to receive the quirk, and for some reason it was me. I have all these new memories about getting it..."
1513322222111121112111222.title: The New One for All...Uraraka?

choices: Uraraka gets really jealous and seeks out the Inverter for help.
While doing training together, Deku watches as Bakugo is hit with a weird quirk.
15133222221111211122.content:
It was so sweet to Bakugo how apologetic and concerned Deku was after the fact, and the combination between his lovemaking and his empathy solidified in her mind that they had to be together. She asked him if she could be his girlfriend then and there, and that was that. Still blushing and nervous at the idea, when the two walked out of the warehouse they were a couple.

The news spread through the school like wildfire, and at first quite a few people were suspicious. After all, they'd seen how Bakugo had treated Deku before. But seeing them in person, her doting on him and vice versa so much it almost made on-lookers sick, any idea that there was some secret plan to this disappeared. No, they were just in love, and it made their teamwork nearly unstoppable on the field. Deku confided in her everything that had happened, and she told him the truth. She knew now why she'd been Inverted. There was little chance of her every becoming a villain before, but nonetheless she would have made a dangerous hero, and now she would never dream of hurting the innocent, even accidentally. It seemed like there was no downside to this perfect couple.
15133222221111211122.title: Mrs. One for All

choices: The Villain is the Slob King.
151332222211112111222.content:
After having received their provisional hero licences, the two began patrolling together for extra credit, hoping they could improve their skills and spend more time together. Deku's mom was still a little suspicious of her son's new girlfriend, especially considers who she had once been, which made hanging out at his place much more difficult. As for Bakugo's mother, she was just embarrassing. On one such patrol, they were having a lively chat about All Might when they noticed a convenience store robbery in-action and ran over to stop it.

Whoever was committing the robbery had some kind of strange quirk that affected the bodies of others, and it was clear he was a Villain. Even with that weird quirk, the young couple hit hard and fast, and the store was safe in no time flat. But as they were carting the villain away, he shot a passing blow at Deku, only for Bakugo to jump in front of it, causing her to be altered by his quirk.
151332222211112111222.title: Crossfire!

choices: Bakugo wakes up the next morning a complete bimbo.
The quirk affects Bakugo's explosions, making them pink and harmless.
1513322222111121112221.content:
The villain Bimbonizer was a blip on most people's radar, known for minor robberies. His true threat was in what he did to those who opposed him. Using what he called Bimbo Beams, that he shot out of his eyes, he turned anyone hit by them into blonde-haired, curvaceous, and fairly stupid women. Researches were trying to find a way to fix his quirk, but not progress had been made so far. "As you okay Kacchan?" Deku asked, looking at his girlfriend in fear.

At first, it didn't look there were any changes, and she smiled at her boyfriend. "I'm fine, Deku, there's nothing to worry about, I think it didn't affect me at all." One odd aspect of this quirk was that, the stronger the quirk the target had, the longer it took for the effect to manifest, and the stronger it was when it did. Deku and Bakugo continued their walk, neither noticing that her hair was getting slightly more brightly blonde, or that her breasts were expanding ever so slightly. It would take some time for the changes to finish, but when they had Bakugo would be quite the bimbo.
1513322222111121112221.title: Bimbo Bakugo

choices: Breathing in the pink smoke sped up the mental bimboing.
Bakugo makes more smoke...which bimbos Deku.
15133222221111211122212.content:
The two continued their patrol, and within the hour they came across an attempted mugging in an alleyway. Meeting eyes and silently deciding on a game plan, Deku activated his Full Cowl and jumped around to reach a nearby roof, ready to jump in after Bakugo tried to end things herself. Approaching the alley slowly and quietly, Bakugo waited until she was close enough for her plan and shouted, "Keep your hands to yourself, loser!" and fired off and explosion behind her to send her flying through the air towards the target. Instead of an explosion, however, there was merely a sound like a firecracker going off and a thick amount of pink smoke, which smelled like bubblegum. Everyone froze, and the mugger started laughing, which sounded weird considering he had a lizard head.

Unable to stop herself, Bakugo started giggling herself, but she wasn't sure why she was laughing. Deku entered from the air and hit the guy hard and fast, restraining him and rescuing the woman he'd been assaulting. After calling the cops and starting to wait for their arrival, Deku approached his girlfriend, clearly concerned. "Bakugo, are you okay? It seems like your quirk isn't working like it should."
15133222221111211122212.title: Pink and Harmless

choices: Deku starts to turn back, slowly, but the smoke stops that.
Even Deku's power is Bimboized, making him sexier in addition to stronger.
151332222211112111222122.content:
Bakugo knew she should be taking this more seriously, after all her boyfriend was just worried about her, but she couldn't stop giggling. "I think that villain did something to my quirk, and it's really silly. Watch this, Deku," then she held out one hand and tried to make an explosion, normally dangerous at such a close distance, except all that came out was a sharp sound and thick pink smoke. Breathing it in made Bakugo start giggling again, her head feeling kind of light and empty, and she was soon joined as Deku started laughing too. Not wanting the fun to stop, and without really thinking clearly about it, Bakugo set off a bunch of further explosions, and the two found themselves standing in a large pink cloud, laughing themselves silly.

Neither noticed as they giggled that Deku's body was changing, his entire body feminizing as he grew large, soft breasts and a succulent ass, becoming a beautiful woman who still resembled Deku, as if a sorority girl was cosplaying him. Once the smoke began to clear, they both saw what had happened, and their minds cleared a bit, though Deku found his mind running far slower than normal.
151332222211112111222122.title: Spreading the Pink

choices: The next morning, they meet for breakfast but she's been changing.
Within a week, Bakugo is a very different girl.
1513322222111121112222.content:
This was the villain's second ever appearance, and not even Deku knew anything about this "Slob King". An overweight, somewhat stale-smelling individual, he was born with the odd quirk that made anyone he used his quirk on more like himself. It just took a touch, with skin contact, to initiate the change, one that hit their personality first before altering them physically. It was a slow process, but the initial activation shook people up, making stealing more easy. When Bakugo was hit by it, she was stunned, leaving Deku to push the guy away and have him carted off. "Are you okay, Kacchan?" he asked, concerned.

Once she came back to herself, she nodded. "I'm good Deku." Then she yawned, suddenly feeling exhausted, her brain sluggish and her muscles overworked, which was weird considering they hadn't been doing any heavy exercising. "Hey, would it be okay if I went home early? I'm really tired." Deku nodded, but he was clearly disappointed. It made Bakugo sad, though that feeling was more muted than normal for some reason. "How about we go to breakfast together, before school starts?" That promise in mind, Bakugo left for home, idly scratching her ass as she walked.
1513322222111121112222.title: Untidy

choices: Bakugo is distraught, trying her best to fight the changes.
Bakugo is actually liking this, the mental changes firmly in hold.
15133222221111211122221.content:
The next morning, Deku awoke even earlier than he usually did. He got his workout routine done with and took a shower, making sure he smelt nice for the date with his girlfriend. They'd texted the night before, agreeing on a diner that was on the way to school. Deku got their first, and waited for a few minutes before he spotted Bakugo entering the building, though his eyes widened at what he saw.

Somehow, Bakugo was now about twenty pounds heavier, none of it settling in one specific place but instead changing her general build into something softer and plumper. She also wasn't wearing as much make-up as she usually did, and it looked like she'd maybe spent five minutes putting it on, if that. Her hair was bushy and untidy, and when she got close enough Deku could smell the slight stench of sweat, realizing it was radiating off of her. "What happened?" he asked her.
15133222221111211122221.title: A Morning Date

choices: It turns out she needs to push against the urges for a full week.
If they change what kind of person the Slob King is, it will work.
151332222211112111222211.content:
Looking down at the table, tears started to well up in Bakugo's eyes. "I don't know what to do, honey. Ever since the fight with that villain yesterday, I've been gaining weight, I'm always hungry, and I have no energy to do anything. The only way I was able to walk over here was because I knew we'd be getting breakfast. I...I don't know what to do! Especially because, there's a growing part of me that just wants to give up and embrace this. I'm fighting it, Deku, but it's so hard..."

Deku reached out and took her hands in his own, flinching for a second at how sweaty they were. "Kacchan, I'm here for you, always. Together, I'm sure we can find a cure for this, we just need to take this on Plus Ultra." She smiled, and then they ate breakfast together, though Deku found himself buying his girlfriend two entrees, which she only felt slightly guilty for. Throughout the day, Deku dug into what was known about this villain and found a way to help her.
151332222211112111222211.title: Fighting the Quirk

choices: Deku actually misses how Bakugo used to be, and is sad.
Deku loves these changes and invites Bakugo to his friend group.
15133222221111212.content:
Before Bakugo really knew what he was doing, he found himself running at Deku and opening his arms to surprise hug him. The young nerd, still not used to be hugged by girls with their soft chests, froze immediately and started blushing. Then he turned to see who is was and saw a blushing and smiling Bakugo. Clearly conflicted on how he should be feeling, Deku hesitantly said, "H-hey Kacchan. I heard what happened to you. Are you feeling okay?"

On any previous day, Deku showing Bakugo sympathy would have elicited white-hot rage that someone as low as him was looking down on Bakugo, and some small ember of that feeling did well up inside him. But far more than that was an overwhelming sense of happiness that Deku cared about him, and about his feelings. Detaching himself from the hug, Bakugo started walking, a small skip in his step, as Deku quickly caught up. "It's really weird, Deku. Everything is so new, but it also feels like it's the way it should be. And my emotions, they're different too. I'm so much less angry than I was before, instead I just want..." Without thinking, he almost finished the sentence as he'd wanted to, to tell Deku that all he wanted was him in his life, that was all. Instead, blushing more heavily, Bakugo finished, "...to make other people happy."
15133222221111212.title: Surprise Hug!

choices: Bakugo clashes with Uraraka, both wanting Deku for themselves.
Bakugo gets along with everyone, and finds this new life wonderful.
151332222211112122.content:
Looking away from the pretty girl walking to school with him, Deku thought for a while and finally told Bakugo, "I-I hope you don't take this the wrong way, but I actually like you better like this Kacchan. I was worried about you for so long, it seemed like you were furious with me and everyone else in the world. Hearing you have some a positive outlook, I think it's amazing." Then, just as it occurred to him, he added, "If it's okay with them, would you want to hang out with Iida and Uraraka and me?"

Some small part of Bakugo was annoyed that Deku preferred this girl version of himself to the 'true' version, but than was entirely underwhelmed in comparison to how much of him was exploding with happiness. Not only did Deku love his new outlook on life, he even invited Bakugo into his close friend group. "That'd make me really happy Deku," he told Deku, and the rest of the walk to school he didn't even try to stop himself from fantasizing about making out with the nerd.
151332222211112122.title: Joining the Nerds

choices: Bakugo suggests polyamory, they can both date Deku.
Bakugo suggests a training duel, winner takes Deku.
1513322222111121221.content:
Bakugo was almost hanging off of Deku's arm by the time they got to school, and when they found Iida and Uraraka, while the speedy hero was clearly happy to see how things had changed for the better, the floating heroine narrowed her eyes in suspicion. After getting a better explanation about everything that had happened, Uraraka cut in, "So, Bakugo, how does it feel to be a kinda pretty girl? It must be really different."

Something like the rage that once controlled Bakugo, now more focused and hidden, flowed through him. This bitch wanted his man. Smiling brightly, Bakugo shrugged and said, "It's definitely new, maybe you should try it sometime, Ochaco." From that point onward, the two of them secretly sniped at each other, filled with a mutual enmity that would not end. After a few days, they finally met up in private to try and has this out. Bakugo came to the conversation with a plan.
1513322222111121221.title: Clash of Love

choices: They go to the movies, and Bakugo gets frisky.
They go to lunch at a nice restaurant, discussing old times.
15133222221111212211.content:
They met up at a cafe nearby after school had ended for the day, and for a while they just sat across from each other awkwardly until Bakugo made the first move. "Listen, us fighting over Deku isn't doing either of us favors, and it isn't fair to Deku either. I was thinking...we could talk to him about polyamory." Noticing Uraraka was looking confused, and fighting the urge to call her a dumb bitch, Bakugo explained. "I just read about it recently. It means we'd be both dating Deku, and neither of us would feel the need to be jealous, because each our relationships with him would be our own, neither more important than the other."

They talked more about it for a while and in the end Uraraka agreed to give it a shot, the two shaking hands in a truce. When they proposed the idea to Deku the next day he was shocked, but after thinking about it himself he agreed and set up dates with both of them. The next weekend, Bakugo found himself in his room, preparing for his first date with Deku. Looking at various outfits and trying to decide which would be the best choice, he marveled at how just recently he had been a man, and even now some part of him wanted to hold onto that, but now he was going on a romantic date with his childhood friend and recent rival.
15133222221111212211.title: A Truce is Called

151332222213.content:
Here are some more possible gender-changing-stories set in the Hero Academia world:

The Swappers Switcheroo:
A new villain has hit the scene: the mighty Swapper! And with their ability to switch anything between two targets, be it age, gender, quirk, body parts and even personalities or lives, they're ready to cause some chaos in the lives of our heroes. Especially since almost no-one besides his victims seems to be aware that something has changed.


The Love Interest Competition:
Two people find themselves in a cruel competition. Transformed for the entertainment of an unknown entity they now have to vie for the affection of a third person. Only the better "Love-Interest" who manages to win the love of their target and become "canon", will be returned to their original state.
But at that point, will they even want to turn back?
151332222213.title: Some other cause of change

1521.content: Although many of them take place in the same universe, let's narrow it down.
1521.title: Marvel comics

choices: At Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters
152111221.content:
You are Kurt Wagner - mutant, acrobat, Catholic.

You have fine, blue-black fur covering your body, two fingers with an opposable thumb on each hand and only two toes, as well as pronounced, fang-like canine teeth, yellow eyes, pointed ears, and a 31⁄2-foot-long (1.1 m) prehensile pointed tail. You are also able to teleport.

You have a personal holographic device called an image-inducer that can be used to form a holographic image of yourself as an ordinary human. It has been known to malfunction. You are currently...
152111221.title: Kurt Wagner, acrobat

1521112211.content:
Walking the halls of the Xavier institute, you wrestle with the image inducer around your wrist once again. The watch-sized apparatus is on the fritz again, but since the cause was largely because you'd been fiddling with it again, you were hesitant to return to Forge to get it fixed. Your human image fades in and out over your demonic mutant appearance, like an image on a badly tuned television. Students give you odd looks and a wide berth as you pass them by.

"Ah hah. Vat haf we here," you mutter, your nimble three fingers finally prying away the casing that houses the complex electronics. Your hand hesitated over the minute silver and chrome components, hesitant. A burst of static, built up from your many minutes of pacing the plush carpets of the institute, leapt from your short, blue fur to the device...
1521112211.title: Image inducer

15211122111.content:
Static crackled down his arm as the device exploded into life. His muscles convulsed and his fur stood on end beneath the holographic shell emitted by the device, which was now fluctuating and changing so rapidly that his body looked like an indiscernable blur.

"Scheiße," Kurt muttered. He smacked the madly spluttering emitter against his hand. His form finally settled on that of-
15211122111.title: Selecting an image at random

152111221111.content:
He stared at his hands. They were pink and hairless, but certainly not his. Glancing down, he saw a muscular body clothed in fashionable jeans and t-shirt, certainly not his leotard-clad, lithe physique. He checked the display on the Emitter.

Bobby Drake (Human) it read. He gulped. To the outside viewer he was now Bobby Drake. Now he remembered - a month ago, when Bobby had become trapped in his ice form, Kurt had lent him the Emitter to make him at least appear human and go out in to the world. Kurt had been house-bound during that time and the Emitter, half frozen on the wrist on Iceman, had never been the same sinze.

Now it had somehow reverted to Bobby's stored image.

He glanced around. He was in the East dormitories and was lucky enough that nobody had seen him transform. If he could get back to the West dormitories, he might be able to remove the emitter and fix it before anybody found out.

He was about to teleport back to his dorm when the sound of footfalls on the carpet behind stopped him. He turned and found himself face-to-face with his adopted sister, Rogue, marching towards him with an intent look in her eyes he had only seen in battle. He backed away a little hesitantly, as she continued to approach him. He noticed her usually gloved arms were bare.

"H-hi, sis," he stuttered. A second later, she had swept him up in a tight embrace and had locked her lips against his slackjawed mouth. His protest was muffled and came to nothing.

She thinks I'm Bobby!, was his first thought, which was displaced quickly by Wait, her powers! Her powers should still be affecting me.

He finally broke away, perhaps with a little more force than intended as she looked at him with a slightly hurt and dissapointed expression.

"Your powers!" he said, gasping for air, then clutching his throat. The Emitter was modulating his voice, making him sound exactly like Iceman.

"Ahm sorry," she said sadly. "The Professor helped me to control them. Ah just wanted to suprise you."

"You suprised me, schweste!" he replied. "Believe me."

His German-inflected speech apparently went unheard and unnoticed, and was in either event quickly silenced as she moved closer again and met his lips with her own. The normally acrobatic mutant could barely move as her hands caressed his chest and she pressed her body against his
152111221111.title: Bobby Drake

152112.content:
You are a new mutant. A genetic fluke has given you a power that sets you apart from the rest of humanity. How will you use it? Which organisation will you side with in this brave new world. Xavier and his X-men? Magneto and his homo superier agenda?

More importantly, what is your power?
152112.title: A new mutant

1521121.content:
You are a shapeshifter, able to use your control over every cell in your body to change your appearance at will. Your ability sets you apart from humans and even your fellow mutants, some of which view shapeshifters with mistrust. Do you struggle for acceptance, or take others' appearances and lives for your own ends?

Even though things like gender and race no longer have the same concrete definitions when applied to you, originally you were....
1521121.title: Shapeshifting

1521122.content: Perhaps you're a psychic with the ability to possess and control other's bodies; or bodyswap minds entirely.
1521122.title: Mutant powers (Bodyswapping)

15211222.content: Do you have the most rare, powerful, and feared of mutant abilities - the power to warp reality to your will? What you can acheive is limited only by your willpower. 15221.content:
In the comforting, dank darkness of the Batcave, Batman brooded. Sitting before the bank of computer monitors, his hands clenched tightly in front of him as his eyes swept from screen to screen, absorbing the data - news broadcast, crime reports, video feeds from cameras he had smuggled into criminal dens years ago. The analysis was troubling - a 240% rise in violent assault, 380% increase in robbery, a 820% increase in arson attacks throughout the city. All within the last two weeks.

He winced as he sat up straighter in his Batchair, clutching his side. It had been two weeks since his fight with Killer Croc. He'd made the mistake of fighting the criminal on his own terms in the sewers deep beneath Gotham and it had nearly gotten him killed. He'd taken a brutal beating, only just escaping with his life and multiple broken ribs. The bruising had subsided but his body was still tender.

Unfortunately for Gotham, his bloody cowl had washed up in a sewer overflow the next day and the criminal fraternity had taken it as proof that Batman was dead. Armed with this belief, they had begun an unprecedented crime wave in celebration. They were doing overtime. The kingpins were even importing criminal labor from outside the city in order to expand their territory now that the Dark Knight was no more. Gotham was rapidly becoming a battleground between rival families undoing his lifetime of work in a matter of days. Penguin was hitting bank after bank. Poison Ivy was seducing an army to fight by her side. The mayor had undoubtedly been replaced by Clayface. A meeting of the major crime families was to take place tonight, to decide how to consolidate their hold over the city once and for all.

It was no use sitting here. Batman would have to make an appearance tonight, if he had any chance of ever stopping this madness. Yet as he climbed from his chair, pain cut through him and he clutched his ribs, barely able to breathe. He couldn't face squeezing himself into his suit, let alone fighting. One lucky punch to the gut and he'd be out for the count.

Limping across the Batcave, he approached the Batsuit...

152212.content:
"Will you be going out tonight, Master Wayne? Shall I prepare the medical kit again, or will it be a coffin this time?"

Batman turned to see Alfred descending the stairs, a platter of food held in his hands and a look of disapproval on his old face.

"My city needs me, Alfred. I can't just stand by and do nothing."

"I'm afraid that's exactly what you must do, sir. Until your wounds heal, you're in no fit state to be fighting. The city will struggle on for a few more weeks without you, just as it did before Batman. You need to rest, eat, perhaps a few of those playboy antics you secretly enjoy."

He set the tray of food on the Batcomputer, and Bruce had to admit that it did smell delicious. He turned away, reaching for his mask.

"If I may, Master Bruce, the "death" of Batman is an opportunity, not just for crime but for you too," Alfred spoke up quickly. "The criminals think you're dead. They're operating freely in the open, their defenses lowered, but as soon as Batman rears his head they will go to ground. Why not take advantage of that while you can. Perhaps a little reconnaissance work - enter their organizations, learn their plans, and then, once you know how they operate, Batman can return."

Bruce hesitated. It was true that, as well as being the world's greatest crime fighter, he was also the world's greatest detective and a master of disguise. If he couldn't fight, there could be no harm in focusing on the latter for a few days. His attention moved from the glass case containing his cape and cowl, to the extensive disguise kit he kept, containing every piece of clothing, wig, and make-up he had ever needed, not to mention a few gadgets from the Wayne Enterprises R&D department that he had yet to try.

"Very well, Alfred. A little cloak and dagger never hurt anybody."

"Except the criminals, sir," Alfred said with a rare smile, as Bruce began to delve into the disguises. He flourished a cloth, and set to work polishing the Batwing, watching a master at work, as Bruce selected his attire for the night.

In his left hand he held a pair of floppy felt rabbit ears, cuffs, collar, and stockings. He surveyed them with a keen eye in exactly the same way Alfred had seen him selecting his armour and gadgets before a fight.

"Tonight, the Penguin is hosting a meeting of all the major crime families of Gotham at the Iceberg Lounge. The Falcones and the Maronis, Black Mask and White Shark. Security will be tight, but the serving women will be able to walk unseen among them."

"I would hardly honour them with the term 'women', Master Wayne," Alfred said primly. "The Iceberg Lounge is little more than a glorified brothel." He stifled a chuckle as Batman held the glittering scrap of clothing against his muscular physique, apparently testing its fit. "Perhaps master Tim would better suited for this role. If you don't mind me saying, sir, he has the physique for that outfit, while you, clearly, do not."

"It's too dangerous for Tim. If his cover was blown, he'd be a lamb among wolves."

"As would you. Pray tell me how you intend to fool them that you're a woman."

Batman gave an enigmatic smile, and Alfred rolled his eyes as he reached for that infernal utility belt, plucking from one of the compartments a small item that would no doubt prove the old butler wrong. It was a syringe filled with a bright green liquid. "Perhaps you recall the disagreement I had with Bane some years back, Alfred. I was unable to defeat his chemically-enhanced strength, but with Fox's help I created this, an antidote to Bane's Venom that temporarily reversed his super strength, atrophying his muscles to a point where I could beat him." Alfred winced sympathetically as Bruce drove the syringe needle into his own arm and applied gentle pressure to the plunger. "If I can judge... the dosage correctly... it should mask... my strength...."

Before Alfred's eyes, Bruce was shrinking. His defined musculature was falling away, especially about his heavily-built upper body. All those long years in the gym undone in a matter of moments. His once massive arms were now slender things, and his clothing hung off a delicate frame. He just prayed that Bruce had got the dosage right - he had been weak before, as his muscles atrophied he barely seemed to have the strength to remain standing.

Batman slid the syringe from his arm, examining himself with satisfaction.

"I hope you know what you're doing, Master Wayne."

"I always do. The effects should last six hours, easily long enough for me to be in and out."

Her face was almost feline in it's perfection. She scowled at the shattered machinery, She... (She needed to get used to that) ... She was stuck with this body and this face for the moment.

Retreating to the Batcave, she sent her details to Barbara Gordon. Not the story, just the request for a new ID, for Barbi, as another one of those Waifs and Strays that Bruce Wayne took in.

The encrypted comms would confirm it's origin, and Babs' connections would ensure that Barbi Wayne would soon be a real person in Gotham. Unsure she was measuring herself correctly, she sent her dimensions to the various family tailors, Barbi couldn't keep walking around naked.

Within the hour, Babs had replied, the ID was on it's way a FedEx parcel heading her way. There were a few questions attached, and a few lewd suggestions, and innuendo.

She called Lucius Fox, and after a brief exchange confirmed her true identity to him. Pulling on a dressing gown, Barbi prepared for a hectic day of rebirth. Unsure what to expect, Barbi opened the Fed Ex box, once the driver had gone. Too late, realising the chill draught from opening the large front door to the Mansion had sent a nipple tightening chill that was obvious to the driver. Tugging the satin sash, and adjusting the thin material it's purpose more to tease than warm the flesh.

Quickly signing for the parcel, cheeks turning crimson, she slammed the door on him, and his open hypnotised gaze fixed to her chest.

"Men..." she snorted beneath her breath, as she took the parcel to the kitchen, where a cup of coffee and some toast was waiting. A feeble attempt to make the day feel normal. The cardboard disguised even the hint of the contents, but Barbi knew it would at least contain a few certain items.

The coffee was cold, as she swallowed a quick gulp. The contents sloshed but didn't spill as she thrust the mug aside. Tearing it open, she spilled the contents onto the table. A passport spun out, a driving licence, a new bank card with an attached statement, telling her the balance. Enough for her to start constructing a new life.

The next couple of items surprised her. Babs' sense of humour coming into play, it was a Gotham University library card, and another certificate from the 'School of Exotic Dance', graduating as Cum Laude, from her year. There was also a pass for one of the more expensive private clubs, with her registered as one of the 'Entertainers'.

Barbi had to admire the attention to detail, she'd photoshopped different make-up for the different pictures, and other subtle changes added to the authenticity of the work.

Shaking her head in amusement, she couldn't help repress the smile.

The sound of the front door reached her, and she prepared herself for the next guest.

152213.content:
He hadn't survived this long as Batman by relying on his strength alone. With two weeks rehabilitating, he'd had plenty of time to prepare a back-up plan. Batman could go a lot with two weeks.

He turned away from the Batsuit, limping slowly across to the laboratory. He had been studying the flesh sample he'd punched off've Clayface months ago, trying to discern the mechanism by which it bonded to civilians and turned them into "Claythings" with a portion of Clayface's shapeshifting power. He had learnt how to control it and most importantly, reverse it.

A test-tube of brown sludge bubbled over a Bunsen burner, moving sluggishly as though trying to escape its confines. He picked it up and swallowed the contents in one. It squirmed down his throat.

His flesh began to soften like hot wax. He hoped he had the dosage right, otherwise we would soon be a spreading Batpuddle of liquid flesh oozing through the Batcave walkway. His limbs drooped and his face sagged, but if he concentrated he was able to pull himself together. It took all of his not inconsiderable willpower to maintain a human form, but he knew it was now entirely within his power to choose the specifics of that form.

He crossed to the Batcomputer, summoning to the screen the photographs and physical specifications of his rogue gallery, studiously collected over the years. His enemies would be meeting tonight at the Iceberg Lounge to discuss the future of their Gotham. Impersonating one of them would allow him to get inside and learn of their plans without becoming involved in a fight he was in no position to win.

His soft fingertips smooshed against the keyboard keys as he browsed. He needed somebody who would go mostly unnoticed among the mob bosses... Somebody like....

15423121.content:
The car was abandoned outside the rickety wooden plantation house. Reluctantly the gang knew they were near the end of the chase. The sound of racing feet came from the house. They faded into nothing, as the Freddy parked the van, and applied the brake.

Inside the front door, the gang realised that they'd need to split up. The house was larger than they'd realised.

- - -

Velma looked around. Scooby and Shaggy stood beside her. The pair of them were trying to look every direction at once. Their frantic darting heads didn't calm down until Scooby smelled food.

"Ritchen." he said in his odd way.

She shook her head at how quickly the hungry pair could forget a danger. Daphne and Fred were heading up the stairs of the abandoned house. Each step drawing a pained creak from the wooden floor.

She found herself wondering how she'd ended up with the two goofballs, while Daphne and Fred ended up as a couple, again!

Shrugging at the inevitability of it all, she followed them to the kitchen.

The candlestick lost it's spectral glow just before the door opened. As Velma entered she found the pair of them ransacking the cupboards in a hunt for food. In a house that had been empty for years.

The plentiful spider webs, and general run down state of the house didn't dampen their determination. Resigned to a long wait, Velma knew the boys weren't going to give up searching any time soon.

The moon was on the wrong side of the house, so the only light in the kitchen was reflected from the greenhouse glass in the garden.

Picking up the candlestick, she briefly wondered if it was an antique. It was certainly heavy, as if it were made of silver. Blowing the dust off the stub of a candle, she hoped they'd be quicker if the kitchen was better lit.

Taking her matches, she lit the various candles around the room. But Shaggy and Scooby seemed oblivious to her aid. In the feeble light she went to the window, and looked at the base of the candlestick. It might have a stamp on the bottom. But nothing was clear.

Turning it the right way up, she struck her next match and lit the candle.

It flared to life, and Velma felt the world change.

She blinked, and in that instant the kitchen vanished. Looking around she saw Daphne holding her hand. She felt ... wrong. It was hard to say why.

Then the revelations came:

She was taller than Daphne.

Her clothes were different, she didn't like wearing white.

Her hand looked bigger.

As it came together, her fingers trembled as she felt the ascot at her neck. Letting go Daphne's hand. Or rather shaking it loose, Daphne confirmed that she was now a he.

And that He was Freddy. She was in Freddy's body.

A high shrill shriek came from downstairs, a cry that she recognised instantly.

"Velma!" they both said at once.

15423122.content:
The Scooby gang, were walking around the empty museum at night. It was a privilege granted to few, however, with Daphne's father discovering the last, lost pyramid, he had discovered a whole trove of treasures.

The Cairo museum echoed with their footsteps on the cold polished marble floor. George Blake explained each item as they passed, though they were labelled in Arabic, English and French. Velma was getting restless, as they approached the end of the tour. It was finishing on a high, a behind the scenes tour, of the artefacts that weren't on display. A mix of those awaiting cataloguing, and those that would go on show next year.

George's mobile rang, and a worried look passed over his face, as the name popped up on the screen.

"Just go ahead." he waved towards an oak door at the end of the long hall, before turning his back on the group. Answering the phone, his voice was hushed, and hard for anyone to make out. Fred wandered towards one golden scarab, and Daphne was happy to give her father the privacy he wanted. The grumble from Shaggy's stomach, meant that soon he'd be grumbling himself. As if harmonising, Scooby's belly rumbled and rippled in sympathy.

Velma joined Fred eager to show her expertise about Ancient Egyptian. Happy to take over with George otherwise occupied. She gave a potted history of each item and their significance. As they reached, the end of the hall, a backwards glance showed Daphne's father still on the phone, so they headed through the door and into the warehouse area.

- - - - -

Looking around the gang were aware of the age of the treasures. Despite her instincts, Daphne's hand rose to touch the bandaged mummy, that was visible through the half-opened sarcophagus.

It was Velma's hissed warning startling her hovering hand, that caused her to jump, her fingers brushing over the surface of the mummy.

1542322222221122222222221.content:
On Anakata Island during its resort's peak season, the crowded beach laid perpendicular onto the mainland of Megakat City. Behind the shoreline were the scattered vendors that sold from food and drinks to souvenirs and the shower and bathroom stalls with the over 100 foot resort spa hotel overlooking the beach. A lush tropical forest stretched behind that covered much of the base of the island's inactive volcano.

A burly yellow brown striped tabby tom was dressed in a red muscle shirt and matching swim trunks and blue sandals. He managed to find a nicely spaced out spot to set down a large blue and white striped towel and putting up a blue umbrella.

Chance T. Furlong, AKA T-Bone of the Swat Kats, looked around the beach, taking in the view and smelling the sea salt air. The tom needed a break from the salvage yard and that no threats to the city had came up in quite some time now. Such a shame that Jake didn't come with him since he still had to work at the salvage yard and do maintenance on the jets.

After taking it all in, he decided to...

He opted to take a small walk along the beach before going out for a swim.

As he walked, he took in the scenery around him, the clear sunny blue skies with gulls soaring, toms and mollies laying down on the sand, playing rounds of volleyball, surfing and swimming, and kittens digging in the sand. Such a peaceful scene.

After a while, he saw something glint in the sand from the sunlight. He went up to the spot and dug something up.

What was it?

154232222222112222222222131.content:
He decided to cool off and take a shower first before getting into the water. After a sandy trek towards the white brick shower/bathroom building, he stepped inside, realizing that it was vacant with only him an the furnishings.

Low hanging ceiling lights dimly lit the room, revealing a wet sand covered brown tiled floor. On the left, a rectangular mirror stretched along the white wall over a bunch of sinks. Opposite side, a couple of urinals, two toilet stalls and four shower stalls, each having a white curtain for privacy.

He went into the second stall from the toilets and went inside, closing the curtain behind him. But it wasn't long until he discovered something inside it.

What did he find?

"Eh what's this?"

On the ground beneath the stainless steel shower head, there lied a purple shampoo bottle. Curiously, he went over to it, picked it up and examined it.

"Purrt: Lovely Lather Lavender" the label read.

Odd that someone would leave this here, then again people forget things in stalls aren't too uncommon. He flipped the cap and smelled the sweet flowery aroma that came from it.

"Oh why not?" he said as he turned on the warm water. He squeezed the bottle of creamy white liquid into his hands and lathered and rubbed it into his scalp. "Heh, kinda tingles a bit...puuuuurrrrrr~"

The tingling sensation increased and coursed throughout his body, making him and moan and purr more and louder.

15423222222211222222222221.content:
During a hot summer’s day in Megakat City, A burly yellow tabby with brown stripes exited a convenience store, holding a couple bags of microwavable burritos, sandwiches and cold soda. It was his turn to get lunch for their meal break back at the scrapyard.

While walking to his truck, he decided to stop by Pop’s Stand that was just in the middle of the street for a quick read of comics. He approached the stand to see an old gray tom manning it while reading the newspaper.

“Hey Pops!”

“Hiya, Chance! Lunch duty today, eh?”

“Yup, just checking on any new issues of Catillac and Tail Tussle.”

“Haven’t gotten those yet, but I do have gotten something new that might interest you.” he said as he went under the counter and brought out a box labeled Purlin’s Magical Pages with a wizard’s hat and wand with sparkles decorating the company’s name.
“These just came in earlier this week, just didn’t have room to display them until recent. They recently popped up in the market too.”
He used a boxcutter to open the top and revealed the contents, then spreading them on the counter. Comics galore from superheroes to fantasy to sci-fi to more genres were laid out in plastic sleeves.

“With them in plastic sleeves, you can’t take them and read them for free you know.” Pops said.

“Yeah, yeah, I know.” Chance grumbled. Though there were many interesting options to choose from and he can afford at least one for just $3.99.

info.brief_description: TG, shrink, age, and morph your favourite characters. Now with 50% more Princess Peach.
info.description:
A compendium of fanfiction transformations. Mostly a dumping ground for my crappy ideas and worse writing, but fortunately other, better authors have added too.

I take a very relaxed approach to canon so don't worry if your story conflicts with the film or the comics or the promotional lunchbox, or whatever. As long as it is in keeping with the series, it's all good. Crossovers are fine.

There is a massive, blanket spoiler warning covering this whole interactive. though I am endeavouring to insert the name of the series or film into the title of each chapter, so if you don't want to know spoilers regarding a certain thing you can hopefully steer clear.

TV Shows
"Avatar: The Last Airbender"  / "Doctor Who"  / "Disney's Gummi Bears"  / "Honey, I Shrunk The Kids" 

Films
"Avatar"  / "The Incredibles"  / "Inception"  / "Austin Powers"  / "Richie Rich"  / "Tron:Legacy"  / "Star Wars" 

Video Games
"Bioshock"  / "Final Fantasy"  / "Portal"  / "Mass Effect"  / "Pokemon"  / "Legend of Zelda"  / "Mario Bros" 

Literature
"Harry Potter" 

Comics
"X-men" 

Webcomics
"El Goonish Shive"  / "The Wotch" 

+200gps for every chapter +20GPs for every punny chapter title
gps supplied on request.
